name: Michelle Lacey Brown
text: Staff was awesome.  They help my husband's little sister find the perfect prom dress. Thank you all!!!

name: Big Tex “Keith”
text: I went in to get measured, she was going to do it for free. That says a ton about the service. She was very helpful and nice. BTW, I left her money for just being great!

name: Jessica Trevino
text:
We said yes yo the dress!
They are very helpful and friendly.

name: Chantelle Rogers
text: Friendly staff who can help you pick out the perfect gown for your special occasion. They also have LuLaRoe and I love the selection

name: Rebecca Stoll
text: Very Friendly help my daughter pick out that special dress and was reasonably priced

name: Maranda Harville
text: Didn't necessarily dislike it just wasn't very nice or helpful

text: Didn't necessarily dislike it just wasn't very nice or helpful

name: Suspectplatypus Platt
text: Very minimalistic, they have quite a few things for outdoors and country-wear. They also have very nice jewelry for any occasion and they people are absolutely fantastic to meet!

name: Peter Panning
text: Weaver's is a great place to go. I have never been disappointed with their business.

name: Roland Vance
text: Awesome firm with great attitude! Tech addressed my washer when no one else could or would.

name: Melanie Jett
text: Love shopping local, superior customer service, every person who walks through the door is greeted kindly, and assistance offered.

name: Anthony Spann
text: Great customer service and friendly staff.  Highly recommend.

name: corrie gibson
text: Love Weaver's!! Great friendly people!!

name: Miranda Graves
text: Wow, just wow!!! Beverly, the owner of this shop is absolutely amazing! She took her time with me and kept letting me try on dress after dress! I actually said "Yes to the Dress" at her shop, she helped me pick out a beautiful country dress for my country/rustic wedding this fall! Just all around great shop with a wonderful selection! This shop should definitely be on your list to check out if your looking for your perfect wedding dress!!

name: Brittany Reeves
text: This is hands down the best bridal shop ever. The ladies are wonderful and kind, and they make you feel comfortable and welcome. I recommend that anyone looking for that perfect dress go here. They will definitely help you find it and make you feel special and pampered the whole time.

name: Gary Chambless
text: I can’t say enough good things about this place and the staff!!! They treated me as if I was the only customer they had ever had!! I bought my “mother of the bride” dress there and it was gorgeous. My dress was on clearance, but that didn’t matter to them. They treated me as if I was buying a $1000 dress. I would highly recommend this place!!

name: Faith
text: I had a fantastic experience at The Sweetheart Tree. The mother daughter duo were so sweet and helpful. They had plenty of options in my price range. They gave me their undivided attention and made sure I felt like a princess while shopping for my wedding gown.

name: Lady Alex Cross
text: This store was amazing. They have a lot of different styles and the service was wonderful. I am newly engaged and this set the tone for how I want all of my bridal experiences.

name: rhonda bryant
text: Great customer service! I can not say enough good about it. The staff is very helpful ,polite , sweet, friendly and just overall KIND.

name: Kim Vance
text: I love this shop with the kick of the right leg!!! Such a warm and inviting atmosphere. Everyone there treats you like your family.

name: debbie campbell
text: The dress shop owner was wonderful! Super helpful and extremely friendly!  Can’t say enough good things about this shop!

name: Amy Lowe
text: I went to I Do for my first dress appointment, not knowing if I’d find anything. They let me pull exactly what I THOUGHT I wanted but pulled some they thought would suit my price range and figure. They helped me find the perfect dress all while making me feel comfortable, cared for, and beautiful. Can’t say enough good things about them, and about Jasmine, the sweetest consultant.

name: Lindsey Leavitt
text: I Do Bridal went above and beyond and made my dress journey one of comfort! I had such a bad luck at a different bridal store that made me extremely nervous to even continue searching. However, as soon as I stepped foot into I Do Bridal and Formal I felt comfortable. They made me feel so beautiful and confident and I can't thank them enough for the amazing experience. Thanks to all the staff that helped and made this day so special to me. I am so happy!

name: Katelyn Welch
text: Went here with a specific dress in mind to try on. I even called to verify they had the dress in stock and the manager had me text her a picture. She claimed they had it in stock. That was a lie. I showed up for my appointment and they did not have it in stock. Instead they put me in dresses way above my price point and lie to me about dress availability. Will not be back!!

name: Dontnettie Howard
text: Very good experience. The bride to be said “yes to the dress” after just five fitting. Amazing! Good selection.

name: Laurel J
text: I went here to get my wedding dress and everybody was so nice and helpful! When you make an appointment you have a person that helps you throughout the whole time. You can pick out dresses yourself but then they will suggest some and help you try them on. Everyone walking through that worked there was so encouraging the whole time. Definitely come here to find your dress!! Prices were also very reasonable and I got my dream dress for much cheaper than I was prepared to pay!

name: Haley Pruitt
text:
So... started my wedding dress shopping in Birmingham and went to soo many different stores. I found a few dresses I liked but nothing that made me say “this is the one”! I can 110% say that my experience at I Do exceeded all of my expectations especially compared to other shops I had visited.

As soon as I opened the door I was greeted by warmth and hospitality. Bonnie the owner is amazing as is her staff. She is super easy to talk with and so down to earth. I told them what I had in mind for a dress and I picked out a handful to try on...then they did something no other shop had done which I really loved.
-Each of the others went and picked out dresses they thought would look good. I took their word and a couple of dresses later- FOUND THE ONE! These ladies know what they are doing ! I would have never picked out the dress they had in mind and it ended up being the dress of my dreams.  It was such a beautiful moment and I felt that the staff was equally as excited as I was to find the perfect dress. From start to finish I had the most wonderful experience. Dress shopping can be super stressful and I never felt stressed during my visit. SO many beautiful dresses and accessories to choose from. Very classy group of ladies who know what they are doing. I am over the moon excited about my dress and will recommend this shop to many others. Affordable and super chic boutique.

name: Samantha Herrington
text: This place and the staff is wonderful. I had an appointment and mainly just to look and try different styles on to see what I liked the best. No intentions at all on buying a dress but the staff was absolutely wonderful and ended up pulling my dream dress from the back and the moment I put it on I was totally in love. My bridal consultant was absolutely amazing and so patient with me. The owner (Bonnie) is wonderful and I will forever be grateful for her and her wonderful staff. I definitely recommend this bridal store. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for everything y’all have done to get me my dream dress. ❤️

name: Shelby Lamkin
text: The best team you could ever ask for!! I said YES to my dress all thanks to this incredible staff!! It is family owned and the owner is so sweet and funny and really knows the business!! They helped me narrow down within just a few dresses to my DREAM DRESS that left me in happy tears!! It felt like a family and they are now expanding to have another location next door just for grooms, bridesmaids, and mother of the bride! I can't WAIT to go back for all of these items for the rest of my wedding party!! I had the best feeling and experience with them from start to finish with my own dress and I am so excited to have the same top notch experience through the rest of this planning!!

name: marco pendarvis
text:
I went in to rent a tux shirt initially.
I was greeted at the door by the owner (Bonnie)with a bright and cheerful voice and smile. That really made me feel very comfortable being this was my first time in this business.
After talking for a few minutes she suggested that I speak with one of her assistants (Bianca)who was very interested in what I needed. She suggested that it would be a better financial investment to buy a shirt instead of renting one,which I had never thought about. She was absolutely right. Bianca took her time in measuring me for the correct fit.
As I was being fitted I was noticing the absolutely beautiful wedding dresses they had. Simply GORGEOUS dresses.
Both ladies were very friendly and pleasant to work with.
I am truly glad I went there instead of anywhere else.
I think that ANY Man or Woman that is considering marriage should DEFINITELY go by "I Do Bridal And Formal" first before considering anywhere else.
Truly Wonderful People!!

name: Julie Cox
text: I had the absolute best experience here!! Jasmine was extremely helpful and knew exactly what I was looking for. I was able to find my dream dress and felt like I made some new friends. This place was such a blessing and the owner makes everyone feel so special. I would recommend this place to everyone.

name: Maggie McCoy
text: Very nice but I didnt love the dress. Worth a visit!

name: Rita Pearson-Daley
text: If you are shopping for a wedding dress in the Montgomery area I cannot recommend this place enough! There was a great selection of dresses and the shop was absolutely gorgeous. The best part was how helpful and kind everyone was. Susannah showed us around the shop and then gave my mom and I time to look on our own so there was no pressure. She was so nice and helped me find my style and what I'm looking for with a combination of my pics and her's. We will definitely be back to make another appointment & choose my dress!

name: Megan Johnson
text: I had such a good experience at I Do. Bianca was amazing in helping us feel welcome and calm throughout the entire process. It was everything I imagined it would be picking out my dress! They have a great selection of dresses as well

name: Heather Bryan
text: Shopping for a wedding dress could have been a disaster had it not been for I Do Bridal.  They went above and beyond to help my daughter pick out her perfect dress.  The staff was so pleasant and knowledgeable and offered so  many suggestions with alternatives and alterations.  We are beyond thrilled with the dress we've ordered and can't wait to get it for the big day!  Thank you, I Do - you guys are more than amazing!

name: Sarah Jordan
text:
A wonderful little bridal shop that has a wode variety of styles in dresses and wonderful consultants. Although it is better to have an appointment, they do accept walk-ins.
It is a great place to check out to find your special dress for your special day.

name: DeVanté Snell
text: Great experience with Tabatha & Molly! Friendly people, quality service.

name: Ellen Wood
text: My daughter was married last weekend in a beautiful dress from I Do Bridal.  Everyone was very helpful and knowledgeable and we were so grateful for their help and professionalism.  Melody was always kind when I called her on the phone and we were kept informed regarding the shipping of the dress via email.  It made the entire process painless and easy.  I cannot recommend them highly enough.

name: Lindsey Tillman
text: I had such a great experience with I Do Bridal and Formal. I felt well taken care of and was not rushed to pick a dress. I returned twice to find the perfect dress, and when I finally did, they let me take my time and relish in the moment. Melody, my consultant, was amazing. I left feeling like I had gained a friend after leaving the shop. When I bought my dress, she even walked the dress to my car for me. This shop had such incredible customer service, and I'm so glad I chose them for the big day!

name: Maria Tartaglia
text: The shop was lovely, and the people were very nice! However on buying my dress I was a half size and I was recommended to size up (totally a good idea). Unfortunately the dress ended up being 2 1/2 sizes too big when I got it :/ I'm not sure what went wrong with the measuring, but due to getting the dress shipped to me out of state, by the time I got it there wasn't time for a return in order to get alterations done in time (the dress was also 3 weeks later in arriving than expected). So I've had to pay over the price of the dress in alterations, and it still doesn't quite fit right because it's too big in the bust and it's been really hard to find anyone willing to mess with that part of the dress so close to the wedding (and because it is soooo big). The material is lovely, and I love my dress....It breaks my heart to say I regret getting it but I honestly do.....I just wish it would of been a size even close to me in order to fix reasonably, pretty disappointed :c You work really hard to make your day awesome, and to have burned so much energy and money doing that and to find in the end it just couldn't be what you wanted is really disappointing...especially since it was so close to being right.

name: Amelia Blackwood
text: Susannah Murphy is fantastic! She's not only a fabulous hostess as she helps navigate your wedding party members participating in upcoming nuptials through the sea of wardrobe selections, but she wholeheartedly helps mellow the matrimonial madness most brides may experience  and makes it a fun & unforgettably enjoyable experience in finding the 'perfect dress' any bride-to-be will reminisce & remember with fondness forever!

name: Takeysia McFugerson
text: My 2 minute experience was HORRIBLE here. I as well as my family we’re looked at as pieces of trash. To the shop consultants, we have more than enough money to pay for what I want, but your shop will NEVER see me again in it.

name: mckenzie fallon
text: My experience at I Do was perfect! They had a wonderful selection of dresses and I didn't feel like they all looked the same. This was my first time shopping for a dress and I was given several different options to try that helped me find the perfect one. Great prices too!! I highly recommend I Do!

name: Julia Doyle
text: I told Mila on the phone about my daughter's unique wishes for her wedding gown. They went to the effort to research her ideas, and when we arrived for our appointment, they already had ideas. My daughter was so well taken care of with interest, and treated so respectfully and professionally. My daughter found her gown after only trying on four dresses! We had a wonderful experience, and I highly recommend I Do!!

name: Shirley Blue
text: Very Nice Out Wear love this place❤

name: amanda jones
text: Amazing customer service! Beautiful dresses and they treat you like you're their only customer from the time u walk in until you leave no matter how long it takes!

name: Ivy Esch
text: This I Do Bridal location is just as superb as the Mobile location! Beautiful store with the sweetest staff! I cannot express how pleased i am with the service and my entire experience! :) Thank you so much for helping me find my wedding dress!!

name: Delia Hasberry
text: Lindsey assisted me and she was very nice.

name: S G
text: Would not recommend. Horrible management and customer service! Save your time.

name: Davidd Mcqueen
text: Had a perfect day here. Very helpful and found the perfect dress.

name: Latoya Atkins
text: Very nice place!

name: AIYEEM GLOVER
text: Very helpful and sweet!

name: cherin shaw
text: Extremely helpful

name: Ames Filippini
text: I had such a wonderful experience with Lauriston! The women were so helpful and made the experience so much fun. I showed them the dress I wanted and they ordered it for me to try--their selection is so much bigger and more diverse compared to other stores. Highly recommend!

name: Lindsay Souders
text: I love this place! Finding my dream dress was so easy. They made me feel like a princess.

name: Mary Frances Gasser
text: Molly was so great in helping me find the dress of my dreams! She didn't try to show me things I couldn't afford or anything that wasn't in line with what I wanted. The whole experience was comfortable and fun!

name: Darby Harris
text: From the second my mom, sister and I stepped into Ivory and White, we felt so loved and taken care of.  Our stylist, Lauriston, was so detail oriented and personable and made the entire experience SO special.  Every time I stepped into a dress she went into detail about the designer, the silhouette type and why she thought this dress fit into my vision.  She was quick to offer ways to customize the dresses and went over and beyond showing us details that could be added or taken away to make these dresses unique.  I cannot say enough good things about Lauriston and Ivory and White.  She was patient while I tried on so many gowns and then the same couple over and over again and cheered me on the entire way.  Our experience was more than I could have ever imagined and a day that I will never forget.  I highly recommend visiting Ivory and White to find the dress of your dreams and have an unforgettable day filled with so much love!

name: Laura Beth Edwards
text: I wholeheartedly recommend you visit Ivory & White when looking for your wedding gown! I am so glad I did. Their selection was incredible, and they make you feel like such a bride (with their barefoot dreams robe to wear in between dresses, a glass of champagne, and sweet Lauriston helping you into every gown!) I am truly grateful for all of the ways both Lauriston and Molly made the process smooth and fun, from selecting the dress, to choosing accessories, to getting the perfect fit in alterations... They are two of the kindest, most helpful people. I will always remember finding my dream dress at Ivory & White!

name: Walker Hamm
text: My sister got her dress from ivory and white and then when it was my turn I scheduled appointment at two different places, one of which was ivory and white! I knew after going that my dress was coming from ivory and white and I didn’t even want to go to the other appointment ha! Molly took care of everything for me and I love her! Everyone there was nice and makes the experience very fun which is what wedding dress shopping should feel like!! You will love them just as much as me.. I promise!! ❤️❤️ They made the vision of my dress come to life and knew exactly what I wanted and my dress was my Dream dress!!

name: Lynn Lowe
text: I cannot recommend Ivory & White enough -- the BEST experience!! Lauriston and Molly were beyond incredible to work with. They were so patient, fun, and made the entire process easy for a bride with no family in town - I always knew I could count on their valuable and honest opinions! They helped bring my dream dress to life, and I'm lucky enough to get to wear it twice (thanks, COVID-19)! If I could give them more than five stars, I 1000% would!

name: Kathryn McCollum
text: I had a wonderful experience at Ivory and White! It was the ideal wedding dress shopping experience. The staff (Lauriston was my bridal stylist) was great to work with and listened to all of my requests. She also provided thoughtful recommendations and was respectful of my budget. The boutique is beautiful and elegant. We were greeted with champagne, I tried on numerous dresses, and found my dream dress with the most perfect veil! They also have a wide variety of jewelry and other accessories to choose from. We enjoyed every minute of it! Highly recommend!

name: Anna moore
text: I would highly recommend Ivory and White to any bride-to-be who is looking for their wedding dress! Lauriston was amazing in helping me find my wedding dress. She made the whole process so easy and enjoyable too! Ivory and White also made the alteration process very easy for you too and are willing to work with your schedule for appointments! Could not say enough positive things about my experience with Ivory and White!

name: Alexandra Blum
text: Ivory and White was incredible and so accommodating! I found my dress on my second visit and it was a dress I never would’ve pulled for myself to try on and Brook suggested that I try it on just to see if I like it and it was my favorite! I made a few changes to the sleeves on my dress and they were so efficient with my alterations appointments and very easily accessible. I also found my veil and earrings at Ivory and White! I recommend Ivory and White to every bride out there.

name: Addie Grissom
text: Ivory and White is just wonderful! From trying on dresses down to picking it up for the wedding, they made the whole process a complete breeze! Everyone I came in contact with was so sweet! I mostly worked with Molly and she is so easy to talk to. I felt so comfortable around her from day 1. Not to mention they have the best selection of dresses anywhere and their store is gorgeous! If you are in the market for a wedding dress do not miss this place!!!! They are THE BEST!

name: Savannah Fernandes
text: I had THE BEST experience at Ivory & White. The place is beautiful, the dresses were amazing and  Lauriston was the sweetest and accommodated us so well. I’ve never met more experienced people who knew how to help and what to say without being overbearing. I came back 3 times before purchasing the dress for my wedding day - both ladies were so patient and so kind, never made me feel rushed and always made me feel beautiful. Not to mention all the dresses I tried on were breathtaking, it was so hard to decide. I wish everyone could have the wedding dress experience I did. I highly recommend ivory & white to all brides to be!

name: Courtney Ravenfeld
text: I went to several bridal boutiques before Ivory & White. Once I had my first appointment with Lauriston at Ivory & White, I was blown away with how easy and fun the experience was. They are so respectful and accommodating to your budget and patient to even the most particular bride (me)! The in-house alterations is a huge plus compared to other boutiques. I highly recommend making an appointment and checking out Ivory & White!

name: Anne Threlkeld
text: We had the best time shopping at Ivory & White a few months ago and I was so excited to pick a dress with Lauriston's help. She was super professional and made the process so easy. I felt very comfortable and confident. Thanks so much, Ivory & White! Cannot wait for my dress to come in May!!

name: Rhianna Greenawalt
text: Ivory & White has been so helpful through the whole process. From scheduling an appointment to try on dresses to my alterations, it has been extremely stress free. Sloan was actually TOO good at her job and the very first dress I tried on ended up being the winner. She was still patient with me even after I tried on probably 20 additional dresses after that just to go back to the original. Molly has been great to work with on my alterations and is very attentive to details. With my wedding right around the corner I can't wait to wear my dream dress! I highly suggest Ivory & White!

name: Patricia Stutts
text: Ivory & White is the best! I went to lots of stores and couldn’t find exactly what I was looking for. Lauriston helped me track down a dress from a designer for me to try on that I ended up choosing. She made everything so easy and was great to work with! Highly recommend!

name: samantha winowsky
text: Best bridal experience ever! I tried on dresses at several other places (out of state too) and no experience compared to my experience at ivory and white. The employees are so nice and helpful and fittings were a breeze. They also have great trunk shows that bring in amazing dresses which is how I found mine.

name: Mash Powell
text: The most amazing experience! For a bride to be, finding a stress can be stressful and emotional. Ivory and White not only made the process seamless, they made it enjoyable and unforgettable. They listened to everything I wanted and put together the perfect dress! There is no other bridal boutique that can compare to them!

name: Katie Hitchcock
text: Ivory & White was my first ever bridal appointment, and it set the bar high for three reasons. First of all, the boutique is exquisite and really makes you feel like you're walking into a fairy tale. Second, the gowns are absolutely stunning and so unique. Third, the staff. Sloane...she is is AH-MAZING. I have never experienced such phenomenal customer service. She was so bubbly and welcoming from the second we walked in the door and she went above and beyond to find my dream gown. Sloane was extremely attentive and really listened to my comments and feedback as I tried on gowns. Her experience and expertise are far above the rest. After thinking on two stunning gowns, I said yes to the dress here at Ivory & White! Throughout the fitting process, Molly was so accommodating & attentive to getting my dress to fit perfectly. She was a pleasure to work with and made being an out-of-town bride so easy. Sloane, Molly, and the Ivory & White team - I can't thank you enough for bringing me the dress of my dreams (and pampering me along the way)!

name: Virginia Cade
text: This is by far the best wedding dress boutique I’ve been to. The customer service is impeccable. They make it All. About. You. The entire appointment is completely catered to what you are searching for. They are with you every step of the way; from choosing the right fit, to putting on the veil. I went to 4 different shops and each time I thought of not only the dresses I had tried on here, but the overall experience! I am so excited that I said “yes” to the dress at Ivory and White.

name: Nenecia Webster
text: My experience with Ivory and White has been the absolute best! Literally the first dress I tried on was THE DRESS! The staff was so willing to work with me on pricing to make the dress more affordable. They allowed me to set up payments to take down my balance. This has been the best and most fun part of planning my wedding. Thank you Ivory and White for making this experience so great!

name: Arielle Clay
text: I visited several salons in Atlanta and Birmingham. Ivory and White was the only one that came close to having the style of dress I was looking for.  They have a wide, seemingly carefully curated selection of dresses that range from simple and classic to a little "outside of the box." Along with great selection they also provide exceptional customer service.  Their salon is gorgeous and really provides a great backdrop for the multiple visits you make once you become a client.  They treat you with respect and really make the experience and EXPERIENCE. This is, after all, your wedding dress.  You never feel rushed or pushed aside.  They truly care about their brides.  Every time I've visited I've felt lucky that this is the salon that I chose.  And as a very picky person who is rarely satisfied, that is saying a lot haha.  It's been a great experience! I'd add pics of my dress but my wedding is at the end of this month and I don't want to risk anyone seeing my dress before the big day!

name: Lundy Williams
text: Ivory and White was absolutely amazing to work with for my wedding dress!! They allowed me to come in multiple times to try dresses on, emailed photos of additional dresses, AND made the alteration process flawless. Their selection is amazing! Sloane knows her dresses and Molly knows how to alter ANYTHING!! They are the true dream team. Everything was perfect for my wedding day!! I would recommend this company to ANYONE!! If you’re looking for the perfect wedding dress...go check them out!!!

name: Lauren Yarnish
text: I had the best experience at Ivory & White with Lauriston. I came to my appointment without any pictures or real ideas of what I wanted and she was able to pull multiple dresses that I loved off of breadcrumbs of ideas I gave her. I ended up with the first dress she pulled for me. She made the experience very easy and private. I can't recommend this boutique and Lauriston enough!

name: Mary Kate Mccluney
text: I found my dream wedding dress at Ivory & White last August, and it was all thanks to precious Molly! She made me feel so comfortable and most importantly, she listened to every concern/wish I had for the dress I had always pictured for my wedding day! She presented me with a variety of styles and options to flatter my body type, she involved the ladies I brought along to shop with me, and just overall provided a top notch experience from the first day all the way through fittings & pick up! Thank you for helping me with have the most magical wedding day, Ivory & White!

name: nicole mercer
text: The most wonderful place to find your dream gown! The people there are so helpful and sweet!!!! They took the time to listen to every detail I wanted and in the end provided me with the most amazing dress.

name: Alexandra Kamburis
text: My experience at Ivory & White was just perfect! From the day I said yes to the dress to the very last fitting, everything was so enjoyable and professional! The wide selection of dresses allowed me to find exactly what I was looking for. Molly has such a calm presence and made me feel like such a special bride. I would highly recommend going to Ivory & White!!!! :)

name: Elisabeth Alston
text: Ivory and White had the best wedding dress shopping experience! Everyone there is so friendly and not only did they have excellent dress options, but they also had wonderful accessories. They were professional and made sure I had the perfect dress! I couldn't have had a better experience.

name: julia dorr
text: I loved working with Ivory and White for my wedding dress, and would recommend them to everyone who is newly engaged!  I went to their store only and no other bridal dress boutiques because of their huge selection, and I was not disappointed.  Molly and Lauriston were so helpful from the start to finish of finding my wedding dress and having it altered to fit me perfectly. They are the best!

name: Kaylee Morosky
text: Absolutely fantastic!! Got my one of a kind gown here and love it!! Environment is great! Fun music, champagne, and the best stylist ever! Could not recommend enough!

name: Kaley Torres
text: I looked a lot of places for wedding dresses but this was by far my favorite. The staff was so kind and knew exactly what I wanted when I described it. I especially loved that they picked out dresses that were what I wanted and looked great on me. I felt very respected the entire time and that they wanted to give me exactly what I was looking for. Would 10 out of 10 recommend this place.

name: Keitha Segrest
text: We have had two experiences (both of my daughters) with Ivory and White, and both of our experiences have been way above any other appointments we had! Their personal attention to building relationships AND their attention to detail is FAR above other bridal boutiques we visited! They truly listen to the bride to be! They also exhibit patience in trying to help you find the perfect dress! They are true professionals in understanding styles, material selections, and fittings! I highly recommend Ivory and White for your bridal attire needs! Thank you Lauriston (first bride) and Molly (second bride) for making our shopping experiences enjoyable!

name: Anna Page Minor
text: Ivory and White is absolutely everything you would want while searching for your wedding dress. The staff is so accommodating and the sweetest women to work with. I could not have imagined finding my dress anywhere else!

text: Had the pleasure of joining my granddaughter during her fitting at Ivory and White. Amazing customer service! The staff went above and beyond to make the necessary adjustments to ensure her dress fit her perfectly! It was such a special day, and I appreciate Ivory and White making my granddaughter’s dress selection so perfect. She will truly look like a princess when she walks down the aisle!!

text: Getting my dress from ivory and white was such an amazing experience! Lauriston was so sweet and helped me find the perfect dress! I was in between two different dresses and they called the designer and got my dream dress custom made for me! I can’t say enough good things about my experience with ivory and white!

text: Ivory and white made my wedding dress shopping experience personalized, easy and special. Lauriston went above and beyond to help me find the perfect dress. She asked the right questions and helped work with my large party. The dress selection was high quality and offered an incredible variety. 10/10 would recommend especially with Lauriston!

text: I had an amazing experience picking out my wedding dress at Ivory & White! They were extremely patient, helpful, and encouraging. I felt like the girls helping me were on my team and truly wanted the best for me on my wedding day! I could not recommend Ivory & White enough!!!

text: Go nowhere else! They are AMAZING. They have huge dressing rooms in which you can bring your friends and family in and have a private session. She listened to everything I wanted and had a beautiful selection. I had gone to another boutique earlier in the day and my experience there and here were night and day!

I instantly felt at ease there, the whole experience was wonderful. Not only is the boutique absolutely gorgeous, but the staff will go above and beyond to help you to the best of their ability. HIGHLY recommend!

name: Courtney Brooks
text: This was by far the best wedding dress shop I went to in Birmingham! They have such a great option of different bridal gowns. My experience was so amazing, I had the best stylist. She was so helpful and helped me pick my dream dress!!!

name: Heather White
text: Ivory and White is wonderful! I live in Atlanta and went to a few bridal boutiques there but going to I&W was the best experience. The atmosphere is great, the dressing rooms are huge, lots of great designers to choose from but most of all their staff are amazing. Riley was my bridal consultant and she was super sweet and helpful throughout the entire process. I highly recommend having I&W being your first bridal boutique to try on. Dresses usually range $2,500+.

name: Elizabeth Atkins
text: My mom and I absolutely love Ivory & White. They've made my wedding dress experience so fun and personal. Sloane was great and spent so much time with us making sure I had the perfect dress that fit our budget. And Molly has been amazing to work with during the alterations process. I 100% recommend Ivory & White to any bride!

name: Leah Coffelt
text: Best experience ever! I ended up buying the first dress I tried on. They listened to what I liked and brought in perfect options! Couldn’t recommend this store more.

name: Mary Walker
text: I bought my dress at Ivory and White and it was the best experience!! The store is gorgeous and the dresses they have are stunning! It was so hard to choose. Brooke was amazing and took the time to really listen to what I was looking for and what style worked for me. During all the stress of planning a wedding, spending some time relaxing in their gorgeous store, sipping champagne, and trying on beautiful dresses was the most fun part of the whole process. If you are shopping for a wedding dress, there is no better place than Ivory and White!

name: Christine Schweer
text: I found my dream dress at Ivory & White after visiting a couple other bridal boutiques in Birmingham. Thank you for all you did to make picking out, buying, and altering my dress such an amazing experience.

name: Carolyn Mason
text: My daughter found her PERFECT wedding gown at Ivory and White.  Brooke and her staff made the experience of finding it as wonderful as the dress itself. text:
This place is wonderful! This was my first place to look and I found my dream dress here. Larston was amazing and so sweet!

text: Ivory and White is such a lovely boutique! They have a beautiful selection of designer dresses and an amazingly helpful staff. I would absolutely recommend Ivory and White to any bride shopping for her special day.

name: Caroline Hunt

name: Shanise Young
text: This shop had an array of great choices when looking for my wedding dress. I did select a dress from here and had them to do the alterations. name: Christina Hwang
text: A friend recommended Ivory & White to me after getting her dress from there and having a great experience, and I would highly recommend it to all brides! text: It seems that every sample there is the same size, but the staff is very helpful and was sweet and curteous

Hi Joy,
I am so sorry that you were unhappy with the range of sizes that we have in store. We have samples in sizes 8, 10, &  12. Also we can bring in sizes 2 - 26 if requested by the Bride.

name: Linda Martin
text: Beautiful selection and staff VERY helpful... would recommend this store to any bride to be!!!

name: Taylor Gell
text: My experience with Ivory & White has been nothing shy of magical! Lauriston is absolutely wonderful to work with!! Ivory & White was my first stop wedding dress shopping. I came with my mom and sister, and we were all so impressed with Lauriston and the entire process they have in place! I only went to one other bridal shop out of town but couldn’t wait to come back to Ivory & White to purchase my dress. Lauriston is patient, gracious, so professional and the perfect guide to selecting something so important to such an important day!

name: Laiken Pearson
text: Incredible selection and staff! Found my dream dress here!

name: Carrie Beth Taylor
text: I had an EXCELLENT experience at Ivory and White. The girls were so professional and kind! Their dress selection was wonderful. It is a one-of-a-kind boutique.

name: Glenda Green
text: Great place to get that special wedding dress!

resp.text: Thank you Glenda!! Loved working with you.

name: Cary Lambert
text: If I could give this boutique a 0 I would. I bought a sample dress from them and everything went great  during the appointment. We walked out that day with my dress. It has sat in a closet for over a month now and one day I decided to try it on to see how many alterations would be needed. Come to find out the zipper is broken and there are multiple pieces of fabric stuck inside it. Looking back, the employee used a clip right at that exact spot during the trying on. When we went in to try and get a refund or even for them to just fix it they were extremely rude, said they told us it was broken (they did not, because why would I have bought a broken dress??!!!), said that's what happens with samples and then proceeded to tell my mom that we must have broken it. I will now have to spend god knows how much money to get the damn dress fixed and its now tainted for my wedding day. Great way to ruin my day.

name: ruth miller
text: I really enjoyed my time at Ivory & White! They have an amazing selection of gowns, and the environment is so relaxing and top notch.

name: Laura Loftin
text:
I am so grateful for Molly and Catherine. (Catherine is the seamstress Molly recommended, and she works out of the Ivory & White shop... Super convenient!) They have both been helpful, humble, enjoyable and patient during each of my visits. I came in already having purchased a beautiful dress for a steal of $127, but I wanted to at least try on dresses at a boutique (first dress was an online purchase) to make sure I had the one I wanted. (Plus, I wanted the experience with my mom and sisters there.) Molly knew this on the front end and continued to give me seemingly limitless time to try on as many dresses as I wanted. We all enjoyed her pleasant demeanor and felt like we'd become friends as we had developed some inside jokes before we left that first day. She was incredibly gracious in response to my "I'm preeeeeetty sure I want that one, but I just can't decide on the spot." This resulted in her eventually making a special trip back to the store after they had closed just to let me come and try the dress on one more time that day. I so appreciate her genuine desire to be helpful and to provide personalized, quality customer service. I'm from out of town, and she is what sold me on buying my dress so far from home. I know I can trust her level of service and consideration for this season of wedding planning.

Now to Catherine, she too became a friend before my first fitting was complete. She and Molly both were quite patient with my desire to try multiple colors of white, cream, ivory, etc sashes, and since my mom was trying to help me save money by finding ribbon to make the sash ourselves, Catherine suggested we check out Oodles of Ribbon/Oodles of Gifts (as well as a delicious lunch place nearby) where we found the perfect ribbon for only $10 as opposed to a possible $200. I deeply appreciate these women and their care for me as an individual bride. They truly "get" how to serve their customers well, they are available and flexible, very approachable and easy to be around, and while I could go on, I'll simply say please book your appointment today... Even if you think you've already found your dress. ;)

name: uncool
text: Dear , Ivory it was awesome.

name: Katrina Nakhjavan
text: Good selection, nice employees

name: Jenna Davidson
text: Wow! What an amazing experience!!!  Best place in Birmingham!!

name: Donna Harrison
text: Beautiful dresses and staff

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jane Anne Martin
text: Love!

name: Brenda Blankenship
text: Drove about an hour to get there for a prom dress. Got there to find the place closed with a hand written note that their bridal gowns and tuxes were moved to a different location.  Prom dresses are available online.

name: PATOTE BARE UwU
text: My grandaughter won 1st.Alternate in her very first pageant and best dress.Thank you images for making her dream come true.

name: Tamy Kuykendall
text: Went to another “formal wear” co. In Jasper ... WAAAAY TOO BUSY for a couple of young men trying to pick out a tux for prom..  asked if we could come during the week?  Really?!   At any rate THANK YOU for taking time out of your very busy schedule IMAGE’S to cater to these young men!!  Customer service speaks VOLUMES!!!

name: Sarrah Ghey
text: Went in with a friend  to look for a dress for her. Amazing service, sizing, and prices. If I endup getting  married I will definitely  check here first.

name: Get Rail3d
text: Best bang for your buck, expect to pay half the price as men's wearhouse. Extraordinary customer service, very friendly staff. Even took my measurements for an out of state tux rental company free of charge.

name: Kimberly Green
text: Each time I have shopped here for my daughters (prom and pageant), I found beautiful gowns that were very affordable. The staff is always helpful.

name: Jeanette Turner
text: My daughter was gorgeous on her Prom day 4/27/2018 the employees there really helpful and they take their time with u. To help u find things in ur budget pricing. I will go back for other events in the future. Thanks again

name: Marilyn Green
text: My daughter found her perfect wedding dress at Image's! The staff is very helpful and friendly. I recommend them to anyone who wants to say "yes" to their perfect dress!

name: Revoria Jordan
text:
They are very rude & deceiving! ordered & bought my bridal gown along with alteration services from Images Bridal & it almost ruined my entire wedding day! Was there for every fitting & refitting even lost a significant amount of weight for dress to fit effortless, all to find out that the promised alterations were not even made. A day before my wedding I go to try on my dress to find that pins were still in place were alterations should have been made. When called & confronted they laughed & asked what I wanted them to do about it! I ended up having to get emergency last minute alterations because my dress literally fell off of me hours before my big day. When I called & confronted the owner herself, she laughed & played childish games while her other employees were in the background! I ended up getting a partial refund for alterations but literally worst customer service experience of my life! Would strongly advise reconsidering before pursuing any services from Images Bridal!

As a response to your LIES & FALSIFIED Statement I indeed lost a significant amount of weight (as instructed) over 40lbs to be exact!  I also did indeed  make it to EVERY arranged fitting & appointment that was scheduled with PICTURES to show every instance I tried my gown on(for 4 consecutive months)! As discovered Ms Pat did not have the correct contact number written down (which I too have proof of on the receipt that was attached to my dress) which still is no excuse to blame the buyer! At the end of the day she took my measurements/re-measurements & did not do her job in taking in my dress POINT BLANK PERIOD! Its time you all start to take accountability for your actions because the consequences will soon follow! Your business has a bad name for the way you all operate/treat people & for you as a owner to go back & forth & blame this entire ordeal on a PAYING CUSTOMER is as Cheap & classless as your Boutique! (& Always remember Receipts DONT lie & I have a TON of them!)

resp.text:
Revoria, your comments are not truthful. You did not make your fitting appointments on time as we requested, and you failed to comment to us that you lost 20 pounds after you had your initial alteration fitting, then you did not come in for your follow up fitting after Ms. Pat made numerous attempts to contact you, until the day before you were leaving to go out of town for your wedding. Ms Pat did the best she could do under the circumstances. No one meant to be rude to you. Rather than rude, I guess our behavior was one of shock based on the fact we had never had a bride that had not come in for her follow up fitting until practically her wedding day and whom had lost 20 pounds since her initial fitting, didn't tell us, and didn't come back until it was too late to fix, then be upset with us when the gown doesn't fit after a weight loss of 20 pounds without making us aware. Ms. Pat is an independent seamstress, not employed by Image's whom you paid directly. She is an excellent seamstress with over 50 years of alteration experience and even under the circumstances of your 20 pound weight loss she was kind enough to refund money to you after she had spent numerous hours in vain altering your gown when
the whole event was your fault to begin with.

name: Lynn Busby
text: There the nicest people and I will go back there to get anything I need at anytime when I need it

name: Briana Hopkins
text: Found the dress of my dreams😍😍for an amazing price

name: Kristen Collier
text: Been there multiple times to get everything settled (last minute) for my wedding and they've been nothing but helpful. Their prices are amazing as well!

name: Bryanna Mullins
text: They refused to alter my dress. Told me that my height was a handicap. I will never be back there everrrrrr again!!!!

resp.text: Bryanna we do not have an in store alteration service. We have in past had an independent seamstress who meets with our customers who purchase a dress from us. She does not alter dresses through our store that are not purchased in our store. She is honest as well. No one would have implied that your height was a handicap. Being petit myself I understand there are some styles not best suited for a petit person. If she made a statement regarding your height it would be a reflection on the style dress such as mermaid style that often isn't possible to alter for a petit person. She has never refuse service to any gown we sell and as mentioned before she does not alter gowns that were not purchased from our store.

name: Scott Plagmann
text: Not happy with initial service or attempt to repair later.

name: Ayla Jae
text:
ABSOUTELY NOT RECOMMENDED!!!!
I came here on an emergency as I had a dress that came and didn't fit. As Peggy was very accommodating, the tailoress is NOT RECOMMENDED. Her customer service is RUDE and she will RIP YOU OFF! $125 she wanted to take in the bust an a little off the hem. Something I could of done myself if it wasn't the day before my wedding. I had many people to recommend for this place but I highly wouldn't recommend it. I feel like she tried to exploit me and with this supposed to be a precious and ever-lasting experinnce in my life... It's made me very upset, not to mention the broach purchased was extremely expensive that looks cheaply made. I was desperate and had no other options. I left with an awful CHEAP cellophane bag to go over my dress. Please ladies, go to David's bridal or something more welcoming. Enjoy this process and avoid this place.

resp.text: It is my understanding that you did not purchase your dress from Image's and came last minute to requesting assistance with a gown you had purchased elsewhere for alterations to be done. I am very sorry you had a bad experience, but I do feel that Ms. Pat who is a busy seamstress went out of her way to assist when you could not find help elsewhere. Ms. Pat is not an employee of Image's and is an independent seamstress. We were gracious to allow you to bring a dress you did not purchase in our store whom an independent seamstress that is not employed by Image's altered for you last minute as you stated. Often in a last minute rushed situation service price would be higher. She went out of her way for you. I feel you should look at this from a more rounded view point and realize Ms. Pat did not take advantage of you but did her best to help you when you were in a bind.

name: Sharon Ryder
text: Staff is very helpful and nice.  Owner is rude and has poor customer service.

resp.text: Sharon I am very sorry something happened to upset you, but I believe we made everything right in the end. During prom season things can get very hectic and stressful. I apologize if I was rude in any way. I did not mean to be. If I remember correctly you were purchasing one of our girl's rental pageant gowns for your granddaughter. We do sell them, but not until all previous promised rental dates are fulfilled, of which this gown had already been rented for a future date. It was clearly marked on the ticket, and as I mentioned things do get hectic at prom season. That is why I mark all rental dates visibly on the dress ticket. You had a new consultant helping you that day and unfortunately she had failed to notice on the ticket which was clearly marked that the gown had been rented for a future date and that this particular gown was also promised to be sold to another customer after that rental was fulfilled. This customer who wanted to buy it requested after it had already been rented and was allowing it to be rented until her wear date when she would complete her purchase of the gown. This was an agreement pre-arranged and clearly marked on the ticket of the dress and is why the dress was still on the floor to be rented for open dates to others until her wear date.  My consultant had been trained to read the ticket before showing new customers the gowns to make sure they were available for your wear date. She failed to do this as she had been trained to do. If I got upset my frustration would not have been at you, but due to the slip up on our part which caused you to become upset. Rentals can get confusing that is why I have always marked visibly on a dress every rental date, etc. it is promised for so it is visible to all. I was upset for you. I do remember we found a dress that was almost identical to the first that your granddaughter loved. You bought it and I also threw in a rental slip for her to wear for free. And, yes I do have a lovely group of ladies working for me. I love them and we do our best to assist our customers with the best service possible. I am teaching them to do double checks and back each other up with double checks and to tell the customer to review the dress tickets also, so this hopefully will never happen again. I am sorry for what happened and I apologize for any upset that was caused to you. I do know your daughter said that everything turned out great and your granddaughter looked beautiful in the pageant.

name: Christina Mohney
text: Note: Address should be Gardendale, AL 35071

name: Christina Lowe
text: Helped us with everything!!!

name: Tamika Lewis
text: Great experience

name: Frances Ledgewood
text: Birch on Main has the best selection of GORGEOUS dresses! A variety of options for any style a bride has. As a fellow wedding vendor, I love knowing my brides are in great hand with Tori and her team at Birch on Main! Five star all the way!!!

name: Breah Davidson
text: Stunning dresses and great customer service! I would highly recommend this shop to anyone looking for the perfect wedding dress!

name: Caitlin Lindquist
text: My experience at Ivory & Birch was one that every bride dreams about! Tori is such a bubbly, kind, and genuine person who makes you feel like family the second you meet her. She really dedicates herself to helping you find the perfect dress for your big day! She listens to your vision for your dress and assists you when you feel lost. The small boutique feel at I&B allows for a personable shopping experience. It is nice to have the whole boutique to yourself during your appointment. You truly get the FULL dream wedding dress shopping experience at I&B. I would go again, and again, & again!!

name: Kirsten Norman
text: 10000/10 recommend Ivory and Birch to find your perfect dress! Not only do they have the most gorgeous selection of gowns, but Tori is absolutely amazing to work with. She listens and caters to you as a bride specifically to help find exactly what you’re looking for! From finding my dress to my final fitting, the process could not have gone more seamlessly. If you want the dreamy dress shopping experience with your favorite girls at a private appointment then l highly recommend you look no further!!! I truly had the best time and am so thankful to have met Tori who has built the most beautiful bridal boutique in the area!

name: Lauren Orr
text:
Tori was very helpful during this monumental decision-making process!  Her  expertise and positive energy were greatly appreciated.

The shop is gorgeous, and the dress selection and quality superb.

Happy to support this local business.

name: Becca Hempel
text:
Oct. 2019: I worked with Morgan at this appointment. I didn't really know what I wanted going in, but she was very helpful in picking out dresses to try and working from there. Ultimately, we basically made a custom gown from a very flexible designer, who was also hosting a trunk sale that week. We had the shop to ourselves and everything was very one-on-one. The only thing  I would have changed at this appointment was maybe shortening the length of the train on the dress more. I give Morgan 5 stars!

June 2019: My experience coming back to I&B was very different once my dress came in. I scheduled a 5 pm appointment to try on my dress for the first time. I had my make up done and had my hair professionally done for this appointment. I arrived right on time and was met at the door and asked to leave by Tori, the owner, because the previous appointment was not finished. I unhappily waited in my car outside the shop for the group to leave. Tori called about 30 minutes later saying the group was paying, but I continued to wait because the group was all still in the shop. After over 45 minutes of waiting and the group still being in the shop, I left and was not able to try on my dress for the first time, even though I made sure to do everything on my part to make sure everything was perfect.

July 2019: When I arrived for my alterations appointment with Elaina, the previous appointment was yet again still in the shop. I was allowed to come in, but I was very uncomfortable. This group was very large and was not properly wearing their mask (if at all) or allowing a 6 foot distance from my appointment with Elaina. Tori, the owner, also did not wear a mask. I also felt I could not walk around the store or sit in my dress, because this group and their stuff was still spread out throughout the shop. The group was present for almost the entirety of my appointment. They were toasting with alcohol, taking selfies and videos, and also had kids with them. This all felt very rude and intrusive, especially after I was made to leave the shop for another client's appointment.

Elaina: Elaina is an independent seamstress, who works with I&B Bridal two days a week. She did my wedding dress alterations and made a custom garter using lace from my wedding dress. Other than a scheduling issue, I overall had no problems with Elaina or her services.

name: Pinkfighter PK
text:
The one on one service at the shop was top notch! Tori took her time and talked to me about each dress, which helped me to make a beautiful selection for my wedding day. I traveled to other boutiques in the area however, the quality of dresses just could not be beat.  I felt comfortable and didn't feel pressure to buy. In the time of pandemic... it was wonderful to know that I could count on Tori and her superb customer service. She made sure to give me tips on how to take care of my dress. I left the shop ready and confident in my choice!!

-Amoretta Hugle

name: Jordan Naile
text:
The best bridal shop!! Tori has so many options, without being overwhelming. She is so helpful and will answer every question you have. SHE EVEN BRINGS HER DOG SOMETIMES! That’s the highlight, of we’re being honest. Not only is she helpful and wonderful, the location is perfect. Have a great fitting and want a treat? Edgars bakery is there. Find your dress and want to celebrate? Go grab some drinks at Moe’s!

text: I HIGHLY recommend Ivory & Birch! From the moment I booked my appointment to try on dresses I knew they were amazing! They are professional, accommodating, and extremely kind! text: I highly recommend Ivory and Burch. This was the first store that I went to while trying on dresses. Tori listened to what I liked and didn't like. She came up with some amazing options. text: My daughter ordered 7 bridesmaids dresses from Promenade over 3 months before the wedding. Several girls lived out of state. They only had one dress of each style to choose from and no way to try on the correct size for each girl. They buy their their dresses from china and if you have ever ordered any clothing from there, you would know that they do not use american sizes.  Anyway, the dresses were supposed to be in at least 6 weeks before the wedding. The dresses never came in and we had less than 2 weeks before the wedding.  In a panic my daughter went to David's Bridal and she found a way more beautiful  dress that complemented all the girls. They put a rush on it and they came in in one week! They altered them in 2 days, all seven and was ready days before the wedding! I had to call 3 times, over 3 weeks to get my refund back from promenade. Save yourself the trouble and go to Huntsville Davids Bridal for a stress free  experience!

name: Thomas Segers
text: Was not happy with this place. They failed to call when tux was in and had to pull strings to get my tuxedo for a wedding. Service was in un friendly as well. For the money that I payed the least that could do is call and tell me when my stuff was ready. Caused me a real headache

name: Laura Parker
text:
We went a couple months before prom looking for a dress and we found my dress but all we needed was some small alterations done to it. So we went another day for the alterations to be pinned back and everything. About a month before prom we called up there to know if I dress had been altered. They said no they do it by the dates of prom no matter how early you bought the dress. So of course we ask when our dress will be done they said we would be lucky to get it the week before but definitely the week of. Then we get the dress and it was messed up lucky we knew someone that could fix the problem on short notice.

Personally if I was anyone else I would only buy whats in the store but take it somewhere else for alterations. And try to pay for it all at once so you don’t have to deal with them longer than you need to.

name: Ashley Bolt
text:
I hate to have to write this, but I feel the need to warn other brides about the service I received at Promenade. I would not recommend Promenade for any bridal services, especially bridesmaids dresses. I ordered dresses for my three bridesmaids about 5 months prior to my wedding. The manufacturer estimated a ship date about 6 weeks prior to my wedding. To make a long story short, the dresses never came in.

For more details, read below, but the bottom line is that I would take my business elsewhere in the future, and I recommend that others do the same. The consultants in the store were very nice and helpful, but it's not worth the headache of dealing with Promenade's lack of good communication skills. I guess they missed the lesson in business school that the customer is always right.

When the dresses did not arrive in time for my wedding, they did offer us dresses from another source that were in stock. However, the sizes that my bridesmaids needed were not available. All three of my bridesmaids lived out of town, so having Promenade alter a larger dress down a size was not a feasible option for me, even though the store suggested altering dresses THEN shipping to the bridesmaids. I felt that anyone who knows anything would realize this option was crazy on a timeline of 10 days before the wedding. What were we going to do if the dresses were altered, shipped, and arrived 5 days before the wedding, and still didn't fit?

So about 10 days before my wedding, I ordered replacement dresses from David's Bridal and paid for overnight shipping. I'll admit that the fact that the original dresses never came in may have been the dress manufacturer's fault, but Promenade did not handle the situation well. The owner did not return phone calls when my mother or I would leave messages at the store, and she did not check the status of the supposed shipment as early or as often as I would have liked.

I requested that the store reimburse me for the cost of the replacement dresses that the girls did not want or even like, but they refused. I sent an email to the owner with the invoices for these dresses, and never heard another word about it until I sent another email, waited 10 days, received no response, and then called the store to follow up.

I don't want to sound like another jaded bride, but the truth is that there are plenty of other local businesses that do a better job of communicating with their customers and valuing customer satisfaction.

name: Christina Renee
text: Cannot recommend Promenade for bridal services more!!! They are so professional and kind. It was a wonderful experience and they helped me pick just the right dress!

text: Nice place 2 shop 4 prom dreses

text: Fiance stopped in to shop for a wedding dress.  After poor attitudes and service she left for other stores.  Luckily the other stores she visited treated her like her day was special.

name: Kristi May
text: I really didn't care for Promenade. I was hesitant about going here because a friend had bought her daughter's prom dress here for $700 and it literally fell apart every time she moved; the material and stitching were substandard and would rip and come unraveled. Her senior prom was ruined since she was afraid to move and she left early in tears. Her calls were never returned and completely ignored by the owner. My daughter wanted to look anyway. We didn't find a huge selection, and the one dress my daughter liked had sequins missing and coming off the back; the stitching was loose. Not to mention we didn't find much of anything under $500. The girl was very helpful and accomodating, very friendly, and helped us with suggestions. We bought elsewhere however.

name: Traci Guy
text: I am usually a pretty easy going girl who doesn't complain, but I would like to share an experience with Promenade in Tuscumbia, AL with everyone so you can be informed before attempting to use their services. One of my dearest friends is getting married 2 weeks from tomorrow. The other 2 bridesmaids and I ordered our dresses back in December and were assured they would arrive 12 weeks from the time of order. The last dress was ordered December 29th. I called toward the end of March to check on my dress since I needed to make arrangements to get from Tuscaloosa to Tuscumbia for pick up. I was assured at that time the dress would ship on April 13 and arrive at their store in 7 to 10 business days. I called back on April 26th to check on the status of the dress. I was told at that time the that the dresses would be in early this week. I called yesterday and was told the dresses were at the UPS hub in Muscle Shoals and were left off the truck for the delivery and the owner did not have time to go get the dresses. I was assured at that time that the dresses would be in Friday morning and I could pick mine up Saturday with no issue. Friday rolled around and to no ones surprise, the dresses did not arrive. We were again assured the dresses would arrive Monday (less than 2 weeks from the wedding). Call me a skeptic, but I have lost ALL TRUST in this business. We have now come up with a back up plan to have dresses here the week of the wedding from another company. The bride and other 2 bridesmaids have made numerous calls to this business and also been given the run around. Had we not taken matters into our own hands, I am not convinced we would have any dresses for the wedding. I wanted to put this information out there so others can avoid this unnecessary stress and hardship my friends and I have gone through. We are now working with them to get our money back and to no ones surprise we are being given the run around yet again.

With that being said I made sure that I took in all what I could & wanted to purchase. Like don’t rush I’m trying multiple pieces, come out it’s like one person with two other people sitting including a man, which he is not trying on stuff waiting. Manager kept making small comments to staff hardly spoke when I came in....I wanted to give them a piece of my mind but wasn’t worth my time,  hence store was only open about 45 mins when I arrived so I don’t want to hear anything about a long day. text: Very inexpensive for wedding dresses and they have plenty of bridesmaid dresses too. Wonderful and helpful staff. Sale racks of wedding dresses have prices as low as $35-50

text: Loved the ladies in this place!!!! So nice even though I had two grandchildren in tow!!! And the prices are awesome!!! Thank you!!!

name: Kim Hernan
text:
(Translated by Google) I loved it 💖 excellent attention 👌

(Original)
Me encanto 💖  exelente atención 👌

name: ashley salgado
text: If I could give this place a 0 star review I would. Never was there a verbal or written contract on when the suits where suppose to be return. NEVER did they mention that the suits had a late fee. They had the audacity to argue with underage kids and try to threaten to “call the authorities” when they were on the wrong. horrible place. 0/10 never recommend.

name: Dorenda Allen
text: The groomsmen paid half of what their rental was and following the pandemic the wedding was canceled. They were notified a month and a half before the wedding and promised to get refunds return but has yet to do so. Each time I call,  the owner was sick, then she was on bed rest, then she fell and broke her arm, and now they are just not answering. The voicemail is even full therefore you can't leave a message. It's really sad to say you are a professional business but not in the business of treating your customers right. Im going to consult with my lawyer. I wouldn't ever refer someone of such poor professionalism and poor communication skills. These people won't call back even after leaving many messages. It has been over 8 months that I have been calling them and yes they hour are conflicting.

name: Justin Chiriatti
text:
voicemail and website state that they are open until 5pm.  The business' answering machine tells people that call that they are open until 5pm.  I show up at 4:10 to give this local business my money, but they were closed.
A tiny sign in the window tells you they close at 4.  Closing at 5 is ridiculous enough being that most people work until 5pm.  Also, The 'emergency number" has a full voicemail consistently.  These people make it very difficult to give them your money.  I'm going to Madison or Huntsville from now on.

name: James Turner
text: Ordered tuxedos a few months in advance put a down payment and went to pick up on the wedding day and they didn't have them in stock had to go to jcpenney instead

resp.text: Hi James, we would love to talk to you about this situation. Please email us at michaelmasontux@gmail.com. Thank you.

name: Stephanie Turner
text:
I ordered my wedding dress and my tux months ahead of  time I went to pick it up they did not have it told me to come back the next day that they would have.  I came back the next day they did not have it ........I ended up with my gown but no tuxedo at all ....it was my 25 th year vow renewal & it was the next day.   I ended up with no tuxedo or anything because of them.
I WILL NEVER RECOMMEND THEM TO ANY ONE EVER. THEY DIDN'T DO ANYTHING TO MAKE IT RIGHT.  THERE NOT VERY PROFESSIONAL .... CHECK YOUR ORDERS IN ADVANCE

name: nicole lewis
text: I went shopping for my wedding dress on a day when the shop wasn't open, but the owner let me look around and i found my dress. It was lovely. The service was very good. It's definitely worth a look.

name: Donna King
text: The 2 ladies that helped with my granddaughters prom dress was so sweet & very positive. Thanks for your kindness.  Made her feel great about herself in her dreas.Will return next yr. for prom dress. Thank you , she was beautiful in her dress.

name: Pam Ward
text: It’s Ridiculous that they do not stay open as stated on their business hours posted online and on their door. Guess they don’t care if they lose customers. This has happened twice. I’ll never make an attempt to shop here again.

name: Christina Alvarado
text: All of my bridesmaids' dresses and groomsmen's tuxes were ordered through Michael Mason Bridal. They worked with me through picking out which brand, color, and material my bridesmaids' dresses would be, and they also helped find vests and ties for the groomsmen that matched the bridesmaids' dresses. My circumstances were especially difficult because almost every single person in the wedding party was in a different state, and two were even in another country. I let my bridesmaids choose what style dress they wanted within the brand, color, and material I picked out, and Michael Mason was always very accommodating in taking orders and measurements for all the different styles of dresses. If I had it to do over, I would use Michael Mason again!

name: aundavis
text: They really helped my mom and I during my wedding. I didn't buy my dress from them but I could have. They had one sales associate named Peyton who really did a great job of taking care of us. I would recommend them to people especially in the Decatur area.

name: Heather Blankenship
text: Horrible customer service. The owner is rude. I was told by my salesperson that I could put a deposit on a dress that was the last of its kind and that I could get my money back if I changed my mind about it.  When I called to find out what the process is to get a refund of my $500 down payment the owner stated “All sales are final” and “You should have read your contract”. I didn’t sign a contract. All I signed was a sales slip that requested my name and contact information. The dress never left their store and no alterations have been made. I will never do business here again and you really shouldn’t either.

name: Brooke Lindsey
text: My husband rented his tux for our wedding from here, the tux looked great and the staff was help with getting him what he needed.

name: Joe McAlpin
text: Great staff.  Got me into a tux with less than 24 hour notice.  See Phillis Daniels

name: Mik S
text:
We rented a tux for my son and basically nothing fit.   The ladies who worked there went to work and got a tux out of the back and hemmed the sleeves and pants to make it fit.
The store closed at 5 but they stayed late till 545pm to make it work .
So even though there was problem they went to extra effort to make it right

name: Bianca Williams
text: Everyone was so helpful and friendly. My bridesmaid dresses came in faster than expected.

name: StewReview
text: Great place ! Very informative and great customer service. I highly recommend !!!! I've used this store before and never once had a bad experience.

name: Karnardo Jones
text: Rented tux for my best wedding nice friendly

name: Shanna Coan
text:
We rented a tux last year for prom and the girl was very nice but did not set the return date with us.  She just said to return the tux Monday or Tuesday.   When we took it back on Tuesday, they charged us $20.  Ok.  Maybe I got it wrong, I thought.  So, this year we go on  a Friday and get fitted to rent a jacket and vest to the tune of $92!  We could have practically gotten the whole shebang for that.  Then we realize that my son told her the wrong date!  We call them on Monday to correct it only to be charged an extra  $20!  So $112 just to rent a jacket and vest.  So, now, he just went to pick it up for prom TOMORROW NIGHT and they have sent it back!!!  We paid the extra for them to "hold it" and they sent it back anyeay!
Ridiculous! Go here if you want extra charges for no reaso, if you want to pay a lot for a rental OR if you want poorly handled business.  BEYOND  VERY DISAPPOINTED!

name: Amanda Mitchell
text: bought my wedding dress from here and it was the best experience !

name: Amy Smith
text: Horrible!   My son rented his Senior Prom tux from them when he put the tux on friday night the coat sleeves hung past his finger tips, the shirt was huge and the pa ts hung on him.  The only thing that fit was the shoes.  I called and complained Friday when he was getting ready the girl who answered the phone didn't even say Michael mason's  I had to ask if I had the right number. I told her what was wrong she said when I brought it back today that they would make it right, they offered me 25.00!   25.00 for screwing up my sons senior prom, for him having to wear something 2 if jot 3 time too big for him, really..... I would not rent a tux for my dog much less any one else from these people.

name: Josh Buhler
text: Went great!! Very professional. No problems whatsoever!!

name: Deanna Grace

name: Cassidy White
text: This place has good products available and the younger girl who works here is very helpful, however the owners are very rude and do not manage the businesses they own very well. Extremely unprofessional and drama filled. I would not recommend giving them your business.

resp.text: Coming from a 16 yr old that walked out of her scheduled shift because the owners refused to get in the middle of employee drama. This is childishness and just goes to show your professional behavior. Please know that this is public and any employer you are hoping to get a new job from can see this and it doesn’t look very good on you for bashing a business that 1) you didn’t work for 2) shopped at 3) your best friend works here, 4) you QUIT another business not this one. So please take some mature advise and stop acting like a child who didn’t get their way.

name: Leslie Henderson

text: The woman runs the store, she knows her stuff on bridal and dances, and she makes it special,  in her big mirror rooms. Helping you deside, and helping you and your family,  . She tells the truth,  what may need to be took up, also,  why buy dress on line  when going in her shop and once in your life someone makes that day special and sure nothing goes wrong, for your biggest day of your life, to look beautiful.

name: Linda Works
text: Looked at several great dresses but all would've needed to be let out. Also looked at one dress that the Hem was clearly not. hemed.  She kept saying that's the way it's MADE BUT  we clearly could see that wasn't true. It needed to be hemed n I could tell it!!  Another customer came in and she  never made any effort to get back with us.  She should've checked back in to see if we needed help but didn't. We left very unsatisfied with the service and everything.!!

name: Coral Lee Smith
text: She is amazing with dresses! If your dress need to be hemmed or takin in, or what ever needs to be done to the dress she can get it done and ready either the same day or the next. So many beautiful options for what ever event and I would recommend her store to anybody i know. She is so sweet and works so hard to please her customers. I mean this with everything I have. Go check her out ASAP!!!!!!

name: Sandy Knight
text: It was a great experience and we just love the wide variety of styles and price ranges. The location is very accessible and is an amazing Historical home. Just love the owner and her family. Great people to do business with.

name: Brenda Norton
text: My daughter bought her wedding dress here. It needed to be taken up because the bust was too big. A simple fix for an experienced seamstress...or so you would think. The built in bra was removed and the dress now is way too big. The store would not make good on the dress so my daughter is out 500.00 because the dress cannot be fixed according to two other ladies that do alterations. I called and asked what went wrong with the alterations only to be told they only do what they are told. They were asked to fix the dress where the bust would got better. (Darts under the arms us all it would have taken). The dress is no longer wearable. The gentleman was extremely rude to me. Told me he was sorry we were dissatisfied and hung up on me. Please be aware of this if you buy a dress there. You should probably get someone else to get it.
