text: Kristin was incredible! We had the place to ourselves since they are by appointment only right now, and she knew exactly what kinds of dresses to pull. They had plenty of options for every budget as well.

name: Ange'l Strong
text: Very fun my daughter was trying on dresses.

name: Cheyenne
text: Avery was amazing in helping me find my wedding dress! I have been shopping for over a year and finally said yes to the dress here. Fantastic customer service and a very personalized experience. I would recommend anyone looking for a wedding dress with any price range to come here! They will go above and beyond to find something that suits your needs!

name: A M
text: Highly recommend Kelsey! We had a wonderful experience with her and my daughter found the perfect dress! She went above and beyond to make this a fun special day.

name: Sarah Gravlee
text: Bella Couture was the first place I tried on dresses. Colleen helped me and she was great. I told her what I wanted and she helped pick some of the dresses out to try on. She was very accommodating and nice!

name: Veronica Waggoner
text: I had a great experience working with Bella Couture! Jen specifically was so amazing through the entire process. She was very professional, helpful, extremely personable, and went above and beyond to assist me in any way she could. Highly recommend them!

name: Vivian Brown Cunningham
text:
Bella Couture has a wonderful selection of gowns. I had a great experience at my first appointment. A very nice, young lady, who was engaged herself, assisted me. She let me try on the dresses I had picked and delivered the style of dresses I was looking for. She was very accommodating to my mother and sister who I had brought with me. We found my dress and I could not have been happier with that first visit. We had a glass of champagne after we decided on it and it was a lovely enjoyable visit.
The owner was there and she was helpful and kind as well. When she saw that I was really leaning towards one, she stepped in and let me know what alterations could be made and we ended up changing the neckline a little bit.
When I went to pick up my dress, we had a different experience. In addition to my mother and sister, I brought a couple of friends along to see me in it. I walked in first, and told the lady at the desk that I had an appointment to pick up my dress. She then began to walk back towards the dressing rooms. I didn't follow her at first because 1. she didn't tell me to and 2. my friends and family weren't all inside the shop yet. When I did take a few steps towards where she went, I saw she had turned around and looked annoyed that I had not followed her.
I put on the dress and she assisted me. After I was in it, I had to ask her if I could go show my friends.
By the time I got out and we looked over my dress, my sister and mother had already noticed how unpleasant the girl helping me was. She made us feel like we were a bother to her.
I enjoyed my first experience tremendously. My second was not so pleasant. The shop is wonderful as long as you do not get the grumpy girl. I wish I had caught her name, but she wasn't friendly enough to tell me and I was too scared of her to ask. I would and do recommend this shop. Hopefully the unpleasant girl has become more friendly.

name: Julia Elaine
text: Love love love this shop.  The most beautiful dresses and kind people!  I am not one who feels comfortable with things trying on clothes and showing people, so I definitely was nervous about wedding dress shopping! Maddie was great helping me pick a dress.  Colleen altered my dress to look exactly how I pictured it and was so patient with me.  The shop itself is beautiful and spacious!

name: kera h
text: I had a great experience at Bella Couture! My consultant went above and beyond to find me my dream dress. I wasn’t fully sure what I wanted, but after telling her some of the things I liked, she pulled out a dress for me that I instantly fell in love with! The rest of the staff was also very friendly. I highly recommend shopping here for your dream dress! You definitely won’t be disappointed.

name: Roya DUNN
text: Very satisfied with the service and variety . Very helpful. I was able to find my perfect dress the very first day I started dress shopping and belle couture was the very first place I visited and only after trying on 2 dresses I found my dream wedding dress. !!!!! ....it was amazing

name: Elizabeth F. Bromley
text: Bella Couture is absolutely amazing!! They are so patient and so helpful. They really want you to find the perfect dress. They didn't push me to purchase a dress just to make a sale, like all the other boutiques I went to tried to do! And they actually listen to what you want and pick dresses that match that! Everyone should make this their first stop in buying their bridal gown!

name: Julie Bowman
text: I love everything about this place! The employees are so sweet, and their gown selection is gorgeous!

name: maria miles
text: Although I did not leave with a dress (at least not yet) I had a wonderful experience at Bella Couture! Everyone made it easy and enjoyable. My mother, sisters and I felt comfortable and under no pressure. I would definitely recommend to any bride!

name: Madelyn Brantley
text: Jen made the day incredible for me. I wasn't expecting to find my dress that day, but with Jen's talent, she found me my dream dress after we realized I wanted something totally different than I originally thought. She found the dress that made me feel like a beautiful bride.

name: Bethany Simpson
text: Loved my experience at Bella Couture! Everyone was super helpful and the owner really listened to what I wanted in a gown. After trying on a few dresses, we were able to find the perfect dress for my big day! I can't say enough good things about Bella Couture!

name: Halie Snider
text: I scheduled and appointment at Bella Couture for a Saturday and they called me immediately to give me the opportunity to come in a week earlier since I was having a short engagement. I walked in and was given the nicest, most helpful consultant! She pulled every dress that I wanted and made the process so enjoyable! My sister and I BOTH found our dress there on our first visit!

name: Beth Dotson
text: Great selection of dresses, and Kelsey was so sweet and very helpful! I had a great experience at Bella Couture!

name: Annamarie Davis
text: I had an amazing time at Bella Couture with my family! Madi made sure to take care of everything we needed and helped reassure that I picked the perfect dress! I could not have picked a better place to go! I highly recommended going to Bella couture to find your perfect dress!

name: Nicolle Cespedes
text: Love Colleen, the owner, and her staff! They truly care about you and about making sure your BIG day is perfect! You cannot go wrong trusting these amazing ladies with your important dress decision.

name: Lori Knarr
text: Bella Couture has beautiful dresses and an absolutely wonderful staff. Leah and Colleen (I think I'm spelling their names right) were super helpful and made my first stop in the dress shopping trip was a very pleasant experience.

name: Leah
text: Bella Couture is absolutely amazing!! I spent over three hours trying on dresses and Carol was exceptionally encouraging and honest about each one. She helped me in and out of every dress and never lost patience with me, even when I wanted to try on the last few two or three more times. I ended up with the dress of my dreams from Bella Couture!! I went in with a pretty tight budget, but Carol was not swayed by that and let us look and was super helpful anyway. I ended up spending more than I anticipated I would, but I couldnt' be happier with my purchase! I also purchased all of my bridesmaids' dresses here. Carol stayed in touch with me throughout my entire wedding planning process letting me know any updates that came up. And when I asked her for about 100 different swatches for bridesmaids dresses, she provided every one. The atmosphere is extremely comfortable and relaxed and inviting. It is such a beautiful boutique with a huge selection, and I am so excited to have found my dress here!

name: Rhonda Lusco
text: Outstanding bridal shop!

name: Dawn Emerson
text:
I LOVED going to Bella Couture to get my wedding gown!!!! Carol was absolutely amazing, as was all of the ladies at the salon. She made the experience exciting and relaxing. I tried on dresses for over 5 hours and not one time did she ever seem tired of working with me or frustrated about me making a decision. She was a lot of fun and it made the entire experience enjoyable. To be honest I was at a bit of a loss going through the racks and picking dresses to try on, but Carol figured me out quite quickly and I followed her around as she suggested dresses for me to try on.
She also helped my mom find a beautiful dress as well. While I have only just ordered my dress, I know that this business genuinely cares about the customer and their services outside of just "here is your dress" make this quite evident as well. I would recommend anyone to go there, it is definitely worth it!!

name: Ja'Lissa Williams
text: CoCo is amazing!! She’s an angel sent from God. Her shop is beautiful. I found my dream dress at her shop. CoCo & the staff made my family and I feel so welcome & loved from the moment we arrived. Make sure you stop by Bella’s Couture if you’re looking for a one of a kind couture dress with top notch service. You will be blessed. CoCo is now known as Momma CoCo to me. I absolutely love her. ❤️

name: Melanie Hinson
text: This place has a great variety of dresses and an incredibly nice staff! Madi helped me; she must be able to read minds because I loved every single one of the dresses she pulled!!! Not a single negative thing about this place.

name: Randi Doherty
text: I don’t know where to start! I had an appt. with them on a day where it snowed around 3 inches... they stayed open just for me!! Once I got there they never made me feel like I was inconveniencing them and never gave me the impression that they wished they were home enjoying the snow or a day off like most other people were getting to do. I found my dream dress and was there for over 2 hours and I never once felt rushed by them!! I can’t express my gratitude and appreciation in words! Thank you so much Bella Couture!! :)

name: Golden Reeves
text: Absolutely loved every part of my experience at Bella Couture! My consultant, Sydney, was extremely sweet and helpful! And they had a huge selection to choose from. 10/10 would recommend!

name: Katie B
text: Fabulous experience at Bella Couture! I highly recommend this bridal salon! Excellent dress selection, prices, and service1

name: Christine Jones
text: Absolutely beautiful dresses with the widest selection I have seen in Birmingham! They carry very unique designers which was perfect for what kind of dress I was looking for. If you’re wanting a unique and stunning dress, highly recommended... if you’re wanting the perfect bridal experience then I’d never walk in the door. Other shops in Birmingham absolutely blow them out of the water when it comes to customer service and creating a bridal experience. My consultant didn’t really say much to me throughout the entire appointment and I did not feel welcome in the slightest. It’s not going to be the tell me about your fiancé and your wedding and about you experience that you get at other salons. If another salon had carried this designer I would’ve have bought my dress somewhere else for sure, but no one else carried the dress so they got my business despite my less than bridal experience.

name: Amanda Klein
text:
I can't say enough good things about Bella Couture! This place should be a must for every bride looking for their perfect gown!

As soon as I arrived at Bella Couture I, along with my mother and future mother-in-law, were warmly welcomed by Carol whom took us through the store explaining to us the way gowns were organized (by designer and price). She knew that I was on a strict budget and made sure to show me what gowns were on sale and how I could get the best pricing. We discussed what style of gown I was interested in (lace, low back, fitted) and began gathering multiple gowns that fit the style of dress I was looking for---and let me just say, that this store as an AMAZING selection of gowns!

Carol helped me with getting into gowns and out of them and was upmost respectful during that whole process. She was very devoted into finding a gown that I loved and that was in my price range. At no point was I pressured to get a more expensive dress or even to purchase a dress that day---which I found quite refreshing, as I like to think about big purchases for a few days! However, what she did once I found "the dress" was just above and beyond! My mom and mother-in-law came up to the platform to see the dress up close... Carol quietly grabbed my mom's camera and started taking multiple pictures of them looking at me in the dress and of us hugging! I now have all of these amazing photos of this amazing experience that I would have never had without Carol! My entire experience was like this, they went above and beyond anything I could have imagined!

We were all so very impressed with the entire staff and the overall store. Amazing dresses at all price points and amazing customer service....you will NOT be disappointed!

So STOP thinking about possibly making an appointment and call them....NOW!

name: Natalie McVey Gossett
text: I was kinda disappointed with Bella Couture. My consultant Emily was the sweetest thing ever and so helpful! But I just felt like that weren't many variety of dresses. Also, it felt a bit awkward to walk across the store from the dressing room to show my family in the waiting area. I had to keep walking behind another bride who was at one mirror showing her family a dress to get to the one they had for me to use. It just wasn't a very intimate setting and I had random strangers giving me opinions on the dresses I tried on. Just not the experience I was hoping for when looking for a wedding dress.

name: Lindsay Norris
text: I LOVE Bella Couture!!! I came by myself and instantly had a family here! Kim and Rachel were so wonderful and helped me find my dream dress which I had no idea what it was!! I couldn't have had a better experience!

name: Kimberly Robinson
text: The best bridal store and staff ever. I love my dress! I love this store. Ms. Colleen and her staff are amazing.

name: Amanda Olive
text: I said YES to the dress today!!!! Thank you so much to the sweet staff at Bella Couture that helped make my day magical!:) I felt like a princess in my dress! I can't wait to marry my fiancé and look so good doing it;)

name: Georgia Tudisco
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE.  THE OWNER AND STAFF ARE AWESOME.  LOVE THEM.  GREAT SELECTION..

name: Stephanie Nelson
text: While choosing my dress from Bella Couture, they were beyond helpful.  However, I felt that the moment I had ordered my dress they didn't care.  It took 10 months for my dress to come in.  I was told it would take up to 9.  When I called to check on it, they said they would let me know.  I had to call 3 different times to see where my dress was.  When I FINALLY got an answer and a new arrival date, they text it to me.  I drove 2 hours from Huntsville, where I live to try my dress on.  It had a 8 foot train and was a wrinkled mess.  I did not feel special trying on my wedding dress.  I didn't even really want to take pictures in it because it was so wrinkled.  When I came back to pick my dress up for my wedding I tried to make an appointment so my maid of honor who was coming from 4 hours away could come with me.  They said no need to call ahead weeks in advance and wouldn't schedule me an appointment.  When my maid of honor and I set a date and I called even days before the recommended "3 days" they told me they couldn't get me in.  I had to pick my wedding dress up completely alone.  I reminded them I would like them to make sure my dress was steamed properly so I could actually see what it looked like.  When I arrived for my appointment, they had just started to steam it...I had to sit by myself and waited 45 mins to try on my sort of steamed dress.  It just felt that once they had my money, they couldn't have made my experience less generic and unimportant.  Wish I would have gotten my bridal gown in Nashville where I got my designer bridesmaid dresses.

name: JulieAnn Wynne
text: Everyone at Bella Couture was extremely nice, patient, and accommodating. If you're looking for formal wear, I definitely recommend making an appointment here.

name: April Barnes
text: Love love my dress!!!!!! The staff was very professional and caring. They had a variety of dresses.

name: Erin Moore
text: Amazing! The staff are all fully dedicated to finding the perfect dress for your wedding. You will walk out with the dress of your dreams and an invaluable, memorable experience!

name: David Morgan
text: Excellent selection. We came in with an appointment and the lady that helped my fiancee really knew her stuff. Great experience overall.

name: Felicia Hackett
text: I love Mrs. Colleen (owner)) she's a wonderful person. The staff is friendly and professional.

name: Carly Bedsole
text: Bella Couture took me from being unsure on the kind of dress I wanted, to helping me find my dream dress! They are so helpful and I had a wonderful experience!

name: Shanta Drake
text: The service was great and they have a beautiful selection of dress. Really made you feel welcomed 😊

name: Laura Marshall-Trice
text: Would recommend this place to anyone!! Kristyn was the best; super helpful, not pushy, complimentary, and patient. Clean place, spacious, and a great variety of dresses!!!

name: Christy Harrison
text: Beautiful shop with friendly staff and reasonably priced dresses

name: A Monica Reads
text: Great service, a little pricey

name: Tom Dowling
text:
My sister is getting married on the 27th of this month.. That's three days away. Everything has gone pretty smoothly, not a ton of stress, and no bridezilla moments, but of course, every smooth trip needs a little storm. My sister ordered her dress from Bella Couture in Birmingham, they seemed helpful enough with picking it out and promised alterations would be done promptly. Up til yesterday, the alterations hadn't been done. Now you might be thinking "well, wedding dresses are tricky to fix in a short amount of time.." , no. It was a simple hem job, and they had six weeks to do it. Six weeks for a simple hem job. And up til yesterday it wasn't done. Fine, alright, you're busy, we get that. But giving her the run around with phonecalls, and promises and then having the audacity to say that my sister is "hysterical" and flat out lying about what you've failed to do, and then charging an extra 550$ on a wedding dress that was already paid for, for simple alterations that weren't even done in the allotted amount of time is disgusting. Oh, story's not done yet, they still won't give her the dress.
So if you're looking to get married anytime soon, don't go to Bella Couture. Despicable service, from a bunch of petty thieves.

name: Brent West
text: Great luxury boutique.

name: K c
text: Top notch!

name: Emily Bergen Copeland Morgan
text: Beautiful gowns and very helpful people

name: Meghan Bledsoe
text: Amazing. Helpful. No pressure.

name: Christina H
text: Wonderful staff and collection

name: Delilah Darden
text: The staff here is amazing! They really know how to help find a wonderful dress and then alter it to fit perfectly!

name: Perla Crump
text: Drove an hour to look for a wedding dress. I get there and they say They only have prom dresses. The website says “Bridal Shop”. And the description says they have wedding attire. If you don’t have wedding dresses then the description  on the website should be different.

name: Ashley Benefield
text: Love this place! The owner is so helpful and courteous. My daughter tried on 11 dresses and we found the perfect dress within an hour. The selection is huge and they can order almost anything.

name: Samantha wain
text: I tried on 3 dress and found my perfect on i love it my wedding is going to be magical

name: Olivia Wilks
text: Love the lady that helped me.. she made sure I left with exactly what I wanted.

name: Yvonne Covington
text: Wonderful place to shop for your prom attires!! My granddaughter Drew love it!!

name: Dee Kirbycombs
text: This place has a lot of dresses for prom. Weedings. Ect. Love this place. No more running all over town looking for the right dress. Trust me you will find one here.

name: rinslet rose
text: They had many diferint dresses sizes and colors, the people were extremely nice and friendly, in all I'm so glad I went here and found my prom dress.

name: Madison Burger
text: Beautiful dresses, at a affordable prices!? What more could someone as for!

name: Faye Tilley
text: Great ladies run this

name: Katie Smith
text: Website is very misleading. Drive two hours to shop here when the website claimed to be open from 1-5 and they were not open.

name: Caryn Mcmurray
text: Beautiful dresses,  helpful employees.

name: Sandra Roberts
text: Very nice,  the owner is so nice

name: Regina Crane
text: AWESOME Customer Service

name: Christa Sims
text: Great selection

name: Kelli Jackson
text: A boutique experience that worked for my budget and elopement timeline. True professionals, the ladies really made me feel special and took the time to listen to my wants and needs…I found my dress after trying on the second dress they selected for me.

name: morgan anglin
text: This was the first shop I went by to look for a dress. I had the best experience with Meredith. I felt like she really took what I was looking for to heart. I chose the first dress because it was absolutely perfect for me. I am so excited to wear this dress on my day!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Morgan! I loved helping you! XO Meredith

name: Emily M.
text: Bustle was the first place I went to try on wedding dresses and I am so beyond happy that I found this place! It is in a great location and the interior of the store is so beautiful. Meredith is wonderful at picking dresses and communicating with her clients. She is such a sweet and down to earth person and it made my dress shopping experience so easy. I found my wedding dress here and I am so stoked to recommend this place to anyone looking for theirs!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Emily! You are beautiful inside and out and I so enjoyed helping you.

name: Mallory Danford
text: I found the dress today at Bustle! The staff and owner are phenomenal; they are so polite and personable. Your appointment is completely private with your own private room. They offer refreshments and curtains separate you from your party while changing dresses. Bustle is a quaint southern boutique and all of the dresses are stunning! Anyone looking for a wedding dress in the area should certainly make an appointment with Bustle!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mallory!! XO Meredith

name: April Hoge
text:
One of my best friends got her dress at Bustle a few years ago and I was thrilled to go there and try on some dresses once I got engaged. Even with COVID making the day look a lot different than I'd initially envisioned, Meredith made it a wonderful experience! After looking through several beautiful gowns, I found a gorgeous dress to wear on my wedding day! I recommend Bustle to any soon-to-be bride who's dress hunting!

Edit: I can finally post photos of my dress! It really was an absolutely gorgeous dress that made me feel beautiful throughout my wedding day. I can't recommend Bustle enough to future brides!

resp.text: April! Thank you so much for leaving these kind words. I appreciate it more than you know. XO Meredith

name: Reagan Brack
text: I loved my experience at Bustle! Meredith has created such a great environment for looking for such a special thing. As much as I struggle with decisions, she helped me during the entire process and helped me take home the loveliest dress. They made me feel so beautiful!

resp.text: It was a lot of fun helping you find the perfect dress. Can’t wait to see pics!! ❤️ Meredith

name: Anna Allen
text: Fantastic dress buying experience!  They were extremely professional and were very conscious about only bringing me dresses within my budget. Found the perfect dress and can't wait to wear it at my wedding in September. Would definitely recommend Bustle to any of my friends!

resp.text: Anna, thank you so much for coming to shop with us and for taking the time to leave these kind words. XO Meredith

name: Claire Hardy
text: Bustle made my wedding dress shopping such a fun experience. Meredith and Julianne made sure to get to know me before trying on dresses to ensure that they would found the perfect dress. Meredith took her time, and she made sure that I felt pretty and confident! I would recommend this shop to everyone!

resp.text: Claire, thank you for taking the time to leave these kind words for us. Julianne and I loved working with you!

name: Miraysha Lewis
text: I loved it! She was very accommodating! Very polite! Customer service was great! Was also honest with the bride about her personal opinions! There is a curtain to separate bride from those attending and we had a personal room! That was AWESOME! Everyone was comfortable! It made me want to redo my dress fitting experience!!

resp.text: Thank you for such a glowing review, Ray! - Meredith

name: Giovanna Beauchamp
text: I had such a wonderful experience shopping for my bridal dress at Bustle! Meredith was fantastic! I had personalized attention and a very special experience. Bustle far exceeded my expectations and I found my dress very quickly! I was in a time crunch and they made it happen, as well as Alterations by Maria Hejazen! Amazing experience!

resp.text: Hi, Giovanna! Thank you so much! You were *perfect* in the gown. XO Meredith

name: Michelle Trotter
text: This place saved me!!! I bought a dress from Bella’s in Hoover, paid $2000 for it and had 6 fittings. I was praying this was my last one since I was leaving in 4 days to go get married. Long story short I left the dress on the floor with a full refund and tears in my eyes. I was freaking out to say the least. I went to Bustle 30 min later and found a dress for $950 and it fit me like a glove. Not to mention, I like it better than the one from Bella’s. The staff at Bustle stayed late for me and made sure I walked out of there with a dress. They fit me in for alterations as well. They made me a priority since I was on such a time crunch. I don’t know what I would do without Bustle!!!!!

resp.text: Michelle!! Thank you so much for your kind words. Your gown is absolutely gorgeous on you - we cannot wait to see pics! XO Meredith

name: Jaz Sarriera
text: I loved working with Meredith! She was so patient as I tried on countless gowns trying to narrow down what I wanted. Meredith asked the important questions that eventually led me to finding the perfect dress!!

resp.text: Jaz!! Thank you for taking the time to leave this. I really enjoyed helping you. XO Meredith

name: Glenda Cortez
text: Meredith Carter! She was absolutely amazing! She was so patient with my girls being there and she made sure I was completely comfortable! Everything is very beautiful and neat!! Thank you so much for this experience! I recommend her to everyone!

resp.text: Hi Glenda, thank you so very much for your kind words. I very much enjoyed working with you! - Meredith

name: Kristy Atwater
text: Going to Bustle is like playing dress up with your closest friends in a charming house. I had the BEST time trying on dresses and finding "the one" at Bustle! There was laughter, sentimental tears and lots of FUN! Jessica and Meredith helped make the wedding dress (and veil) selection such a fun and stress free experience.  They had a wonderful variety to try and Jessica listened to my vision and provided perfect suggestions.  I hated for the fun to end and could have stayed all day! Thank you Jessica, Meredith and Bustle for an AMAZING experience.  I highly recommend Bustle to anyone in the market for a dress!!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Kristy, for taking the time to leave such a kind review for us. Both Jessica and I really enjoyed working with you! XO - Meredith

name: Stacy Fountain
text: Bustle gave my daughter the perfect experience in choosing her wedding gown. The expertise of the consultant was evident from the moment we walked in and we walked out with a beautiful dress that was within our budget. Can’t recommend them highly enough. Gorgeous gowns and an exceptional experience!

resp.text: Hi Stacy, thank you so much for your kind words. This means more than you know! - Meredith

name: Audrey Smith
text: The staff at Bustle provided me with a perfect and calm wedding dress and veil shopping experience. I would recommend this to every bride in the Birmingham area!

resp.text: Thank you so very much, Audrey!!

name: Jacquelyn Beattie
text:
This boutique is wonderful! During my appointment time, I was provided with so many beautiful dresses to try on and never felt rushed! When I had a mini-scare over the dress I originally picked, the staff was wonderful to work with me and help me get the dress I wanted.

Also, the setup of this dressing room was awesome! I’ve been to other bridal stores where you’re either sent off to a dressing room in the back (away from your friends/family) or it’s a big, open room (changing directly in front of them!). At Bustle, a curtain is drawn while you’re changing and pulled back when you’re ready! If you’re going shopping with your future MIL, this is a great store to pick!

Again, so thankful for the staff and this lovely store!

resp.text: Thank you, Jackie!!

name: Leah Shaddix
text: LOVED my experience at Bustle. McKinley was so sweet and helped me find the dress of my dreams while staying in budget. The best part of bustle is that you get to walk out of the shop the day of with your dress in hand. I would definitely recommend Bustle to any bride to be.

resp.text: Thank you, Leah!!

name: Amelie Thomas
text: Shopping for a wedding dress at Bustle was an absolute dream! Meredith listened to exactly what I was looking for and brought out an array of the most stunning dresses! I walked out with the perfect dress for me after only trying on two!! She also was encouraging and beyond helpful. I cannot recommend this sweet little shop enough. It should be your first stop if you’re on the hunt for the perfect gown.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Amelie! XO Meredith

name: Brittney Vigna
text: The BEST experience at Bustle! Cherry was so nice and amazing. When you’re thinking of how you want your dress searching experience, Bustle takes it to the next level. She was so prepared! The dresses are all absolutely beautiful and affordable. There wasn’t a single dress that I tried on that I didn’t like, but it came down to two that I absolutely loved. Cherry went above and beyond to make sure I had the time/all info to make the choice. It was so easy to say “yes to the dress” there. If you’re looking for a dress and are in Birmingham (or honestly anywhere) you NEED to go to Bustle. Truly a next level experience.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave these kind words for us, Brittney.

name: Maggie Rountree
text:
My experience at Bustle was everything I’d been hoping for when it came time to picking out my wedding dress with my mom. The shop is small, quiet, clean, full of natural light and white textures. The intimate setting is perfect for a stress-free experience of finding the perfect dress.

Meredith knows her craft and listened carefully as I shared what I was looking for. She helped me narrow down all my favorite picks. She wasn’t pushy and never tried to talk me into a dress I wasn’t sure about. When I found a dress I really liked, she would quietly disappear into a back room so my mom and I could share a sweet moment together.

I can’t say enough wonderful things about my experience at Bustle and those special memories with my mom that I’ll treasure forever. A big thanks to Meredith for her attention to detail, thoughtfulness and commitment to excellence.

If you’re looking for more than just finding a dress, Bustle is the place to go.

Thank you, again, Meredith!

resp.text: Thank you, Maggie!!! I loved working with you ladies. XO Meredith

name: Amanda McPoland
text: I had such an amazing experience at Bustle. Meredith was so kind and a beyond great consultant. She took the time to understand what I was looking for and helped me feel comfortable during the entire process.  10/10 would definitely recommend any brides looking  for their dress to go to Bustle! ❤️

Rather than giving up on our search, Meredith told me that she had an idea and ran back to her inventory.

Upon her return, she told me that the dress she had picked out for me to try next was A LOT different, but that I had to give it a chance. I went in saying that I wanted a sleeveless dress with minimal detailing and a low cut back. She came back with an entirely beaded dress with a highly detailed back. At first look, I thought she was crazy, but I tried it on and was surprised - this was the look I was going for, I just didn’t know it! Thank goodness Meredith did.

I now recommend Bustle to all brides and my friends who have taken that advice have been so happy they did!

Meredith did everything I expected. She sat down with me at first in a calm environment just to discuss my wedding and my vision for my dress. She wasn't familiar with my Georgia venue, so she pulled up my chapel online which really impressed me. That showed me she was serious about helping me find the right dress. Of course I showed her lots of pictures of dresses I had tried on previously and loved. Based on our conversation, she picked about 5-7 beautiful dresses all of which were 9/10s in my book! Each had some aspect I had mentioned to her that I was looking for. Her last pick was my 10/10 and matched my descriptive words I gave her that I wanted in a dress being unique, romantic, and feminine. Meredith listened to everything I wanted and constantly paid attention to how I was feeling in each dress. I can tell she takes her job very seriously and I recommend any woman looking for a dress in the area to visit Bustle. The best part of it all, this dress was in perfect condition and was half the price if I were to have ordered it. Thanks Meredith! Can't wait to send you pictures!!

resp.text: Rachel, thank you for these kind words. This means so much more than you know. I really enjoyed helping you and cannot wait to see your wedding photos! xo - Meredith

name: Rachel Jones
text: I cannot say enough good things about Bustle!! A timeless, classy and inviting dress shop located in the heart of Edgewood. I have been in several wedding parties where the bride has purchased her dress from Bustle and the selection and staff never cease to amaze me. Everyone who works in the shop is so knowledgeable and never intimidating. I will definitely be purchasing my wedding dress from there. I wouldn't trust anyone else with such an important decision.

resp.text: Thank you, Rachel!!

name: Rachel Foy
text: They went out of their way to help me find the perfect dress! I can’t say enough good things- total dream to work with!

resp.text: Thank you SO much, Rachel!!

name: Marian Carter
text: Every bride should make an appointment at Bustle.  Each appointment is tailored to exactly what the bride is looking for. She can come alone or bring all of her bridesmaids.  Tell Meredith exactly what you are looking for and she will do her best to have the perfect dress for your special day.

resp.text: Thank you, Marian!

name: Kristin Owen
text: Meredith helped me find the perfect bridesmaid dress! She was kind and quick about ordering my dress and getting it delivered to me. And I loved it! I’ve already used it twice!

text: As father of the bride I was impressed by the atmosphere, the decor, the care of the attendant, and the dresses themselves. The dress that I would have picked for her was at Bustle, though she decided on one from elsewhere. What I saw were higher class, higher quality dresses, at least some of which were American made.

resp.text: Hi Karl, thank you so much for this kind and thoughtful review. I so enjoyed working with your family and am happy to hear you enjoyed the experience here. - Meredith

name: Jacki Rodgers
text: I have had the pleasure of knowing Meredith for about 4 years.  She is beyond amazing and so is her passion for her work.  I guarantee she will make your special day even more special by helping you choose the perfect dress.  You are in the best hands at Bustle!

resp.text: Thank you, Jacki!!!

name: Claire Turner
text: I had been to one other dress shop before Bustle and it was fine. I looked around a bit, pulled some dresses, and had a nice consultant assisting me. I was pleased when I left, but I hadn't had that full bridal experience there. But then I went to Bustle. I was sat down with Meredith and Claire and they asked me some questions about myself, asking me to describe my style with three words. They then led me into a room where I changed into a comfy robe and they brought in some dresses for me to try based on the three adjectives I had told them while my mom and friends waited in a beautiful, sun-filled room adjacent to my dressing room. All the dresses I was brought were unique, affordable, and beautiful, and Meredith and Claire were so so SO professional (they did have to see me naked after all), so sweet, so knowledgeable, so helpful, and picked the perfect dresses for me. I knew which dress would be mine as soon as they brought it into the room, and I went home with a gorgeous Willowby by Watters gown that day. No waiting for my dress to arrive. No stress about picking up 15 different dresses wondering which one will work. No awkwardness about changing in front of them or about disliking a dress. No pushiness or pressure to find my dress. A ton of my friends have gotten dresses here, too, and it's easy to see why - Bustle is the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Claire!!!

name: Missy McIntyre
text: What a fabulous place to shop for a wedding dress! Bustle was the first and only place I tried on dresses. I went home with the second dress I put on! Meredith and her mother were so helpful and wonderful to work with. Go to Bustle for a lovely dress selection at a fantastic price.

resp.text: Missy, thank you so much for your kind words! We LOVED helping you find the perfect gown!!

She tried on several other dresses that they chose for her and found a second choice that was beautiful too but once they got word back from the seamstress that the issue with the first dress could be fixed she said "now I can fall in love with the dress!"  I was impressed with how the staff asked great questions to learn what the brides taste was. They only pulled dresses that fit what she wanted and you could tell they really knew their job. name: Glynda Stephenson
text: I would give them zero stars but it wasn't an option. I am the seamstress who was called by the Mother-in-law to be of the bride in a panic. It is 3 weeks before the wedding, the seamstress the shop assigned to her and the shop were not returning her calls about the dress. When she finally got the lady to answer, she told the bride that she just couldn't get in the mood to do the relatively minor alterations. The bride picked up the dress that evening and brought it to me. I have been so upset by her treatment. Her Aunt has attempted to contact the shop, at first to make them aware of the issues with the seamstress for their benefit. With no returned calls, I feel they are aware.  A wedding is expensive to plan and one of the most important days in the  life of a couple. It cannot be postponed because a seamstress who committed to altering a wedding dress that cost in excess of $1,000 didn't feel like doing it. The upsetting part is no one was going to let her know!! The alterations are not difficult, but time consuming on such short notice. No bride should be treated like this!!!

resp.text:
Ms. Stephenson, I am not aware of this problem existing with a Bridal gown-I would like to discuss this with you and get the name of the lady who was "not in the mood to do the alterations!" We strive to provide seamstresses who enjoy working with Brides as they prepare for their special day. If you are not able to contact us please have the Bride to call. Again, this is not our policy on how to treat our customers and we will discuss this matter further with the seamstresses. We appreciate you helping the Bride.
Ramona

name: Caitlin Gareri
text: Cherry Tree Lane is a fabulous choice for your Formal or Bridal selections! I purchased my wedding gown and bridesmaids dresses here. After describing to the owner (Kathryn) what I wanted, she led me straight to her selections. This girl knows her stuff and is very passionate about her work. I could not have asked for a better experience! Go see them today!

name: Sarabeth McLendon Jumper
text:
The worst dress shop I have ever experienced in my 32 years of life. First of all, when you walk in the doors, the girls working there can’t even put down their phones long enough to greet you or make you feel welcome or actually important like you want my business. Not just one time did this happen but every single time I went in there recently (5+) for a wedding I was a part of. Finally once I promoted then to help measure me for my dress, she totally measured me wrong, so I ended up getting a dress 2 sizes too big. Surprise surprise when I need alterations and it costed me an additional $90. Are you kidding me? That is outrageous.

So my dress arrives at the shop and I get an obnoxious text that says, “your dress is ready, you have 7-10 days to come and get it.” Not polite or anything. Not hey, your dress is in, we would love for you to come pick it up as soon as possible or at your earliest convenience. Why so rude? And it’s not just me, every single one of the bridesmaids said the same thing.

Don’t get me started on their alterations lady. I was already mad that I had made the trek to the dress shop to try it on but once I put it on, I said ok way too big can y’all pin it for alterations? Oh no we don’t do that. You have to make a separate appointment with our alterations lady. She’s really busy too so I’m not sure when she can get to you? Um what? So I have to drive over here a separate time for her to pin my dress? You are a dress shop, why don’t yall do that? None of this makes sense to me.

So I come back to the dress shop to meet the alterations lady, mind you my dress is 2 sizes too big. She looks at my dress and is like on your dress is perfect. Doesn’t need much at all. What? It’s literally falling off of me. Once I prompt her where it needs to be altered, informs me it will be $90. Are you kidding me? That’s a new dress. There was something wrong with every single girl’s dress. Not to mention the bride was having serious anxiety about her alterations bc she had altered a dress previously and it was literally made for a child. Couldn’t fit her leg in the waist. So bride was super anxious about her dress even being correct. One bridesmaid, she hemmed the chiffon but not the under layer. All in all alterations were a mess and not worth the money.

Now let me talk about the tuxedos. What a disaster? Wednesday before the wedding on Saturday, the groomsmen were texted: your tuxedo is in, you have until 5pm to pick it up. This text was sent at 12:55 pm that day. What about the people that work? And not a polite text like: hey, your tux is here, we would like for you to come and try it on ASAP because if there is any issues, we want to handle it before Friday so we can overnight the correct size and get to you by Saturday. Just rude and inconsiderate.

The grooms shirt was literally made for T-Rex. There were 11 groomsmen. Only about 5 of their shirts fit. And not like oh we can make it work, like completely wrong and look horrible. When the dress shop was told and called, they said oh well the groomsmen can just swap around. What??? Um no. You measured the groomsmen or were given exact sizes, the least you could do would be to get this fixed. Oh and every single one if the groomsmen paid over $200 for this tuxedo that was completely the wrong size including the groom and the junior groomsmen that were both 5 years old. Come on. That’s ridiculous. And most weddings I’ve been in, the shop has given the groom his tux for free, but nope not Cherry Tree. freaking rip off.

None of the tux’s fit and the groomsmen are scrambling to make it work, one of them puts on his pants, literally 7inches too short. I call Cherry Tree. This is 1pm, the wedding is at 5. She calls me back and says that we will just have to make it work, take the hem out of the pants and go buy some grey socks and hope it blends in. Um what? She also tells me “we don’t like to be stressed at 1pm on a Saturday” what??? Omg.

The absolute worst. I will never be back. They act like they are the only shop in town. But they aren’t!!

resp.text:
Dear Sarabeth McLendon Jumper,
Thank you so much for your review. I am terribly sorry that your experience wasn’t what you expected it to be.  We will definitely use your constructive criticism as a learning and growth opportunity for us as we proudly serve the Shoals area.  If you have any other complaints or concerns, please call me at 256-767-4262.  Thanks again !
Kathryn

name: Holly Keeton
text: I do not live close to this bridal store, so I had to call in my measurements (waist, bust, hips) so they could order me a bridesmaid dress. Long story short, they ordered me a dress that was not even my size (the dress was HUGE), and I had to go spend over $100 just to get it altered/taken in because the dress was a size and a half too big. The bridal shop tired to tell me that it was the size that I gave with my measurements, but I am an eight, and they gave me a ten. I even measured the dress myself, and the ten that they gave me wasn't even a true ten, it was actually bigger. I told the lady on the phone that (she wasn't the owner), and the lady on the phone would not let me talk to a manager or let me leave my name so she could talk to me. She even told me that she didn't even know when the manager comes and goes from the store...what a joke. There was no refund or another dress offered. The owner even tried telling the bride that this all happened because I did not go to the store location and get measured by them. INCHES are INCHES, and I am NOT about to drive over an hour away to get measured for a dress when a simple phone call should be sufficient. I guess I should consider myself lucky, because according to the bride, the maid of honor was a size 12 or 14, and this bridal shop gave her a 20. A TWENTY. The other bridesmaids had sizing issues with their dresses also. I mean, mistakes will be made, but as a business, they should try to fix the mistakes that they made. I would not recommend this place to ANYONE. They even tried to offer an altering place to get it fixed...and obviously, I would NOT give business to anyone that they felt was worthy after the experience that I had with this bridal shop.

text: Definitely do not recommend. Although Mrs. Allison is super nice, she almost completely ruined my wedding dress. It was cut too short, and she completely cut through the lace appliqués instead of around them like every other seamstress would do. I lost a bit of weight and had to have the dress taken in. Her alterations caused the dress to poke out in multiple spaces, even though I went in for multiple fittings. She sewed the straps on and they were visibly crooked. I had to go to another seamstress to salvage the dress the week before my wedding. My dress ended up being too short on my wedding day because lace isn’t really fixable.

I could not be happier with the work she did. I would totally recommend her alteration services.

text: Alison did an incredible job altering my wedding dress! My wedding plans changed quickly and she was so kind to put sleeves on my dress as well as all other alterations in just 3 weeks! She’s so professional and talented. Thanks Alison!

name: Tiana Lady_Pickle
text:
I may be a wee bit bias on this review because 1) my b.f.f of over 20 years is getting married and this was where we went for her wedding dress alterations and 2) I have a passion for fashion and being surrounded by threads, fabrics, measuring tape, etc. gets me a bit giddy inside. On the other hand, without these bias feelings, the experience was still found to be truly enjoyable, easy-breezy, and memorable. Alison Anne did an excellent job with altering my b.f.f's dress and turning it into something of a dream! She was very kind, open to new ideas and suggestions, and had a consistent "can do" attitude throughout the entire process.

Not only do I believe she deserves a 5 star rating for her service, but because she made my b.f.f more than satisfied with the final product: tucking in parts here, added intricate designs there, an adustment elsewhere... the whole deal! My only advice is to make sure to come in with a clear idea of what you have in mind so that she has the ability to make your wishes come true. Luckily, my b.f.f had knew exactly what she was looking for and the finished product was more than what I expected! If you're looking to alter special occasion attire: weddings, proms, balls, and other special events, I highly recommend Alison Anne for the job!

name: Nicole Buziak
text: This boutique is absolutely spectacular! The women who own it are super nice, hard working, and you can tell that they love what they do! They're friendly and make the entire experience fun and positive! There's so many gorgeous options and styles to choose from so you can't go wrong! I would recommend them to any family member or friend. When I get engaged, they'll be the people I go to. Can't recommend enough!

resp.text: Thank you Nicole! Your kind feedback is very much appreciated.

name: Cerra Little
text: This is the best place in the Tuscaloosa area to buy a wedding dress! The ladies were so friendly, honest, helpful, and informative. I have been to several wedding dress stores and this was by FAR the best experience I had! I wish I could do it over and over again with them.

resp.text: Thank you Cerra! We had the best time with you as well, as you are impossible not to adore. We are honored to call ourselves a tiny part of your Big Day.

name: Helene Brock
text: This is the place to get a dress! They are very sweet and great at helping you pick the perfect dress. Very professional and have beautiful dresses!

resp.text: Thank you Helene! We appreciate you chose our boutique as your wedding dress shopping destination and we are honored to call you one of Evanna’s Brides.

name: Anica Marx
text: My shopping experience at Evanna's bridal was amazing! Eva and Anna are the best - very welcoming and friendly! They helped me find the dress of my dreams. They offer beautiful, high-quality wedding dresses in a very pretty store. The alterations of my wedding dress worked out perfectly, as well as those of my fiancé's wedding suit. Highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Anica, we can't thank you enough for your kind feedback! We really appreciate you choosing Evanna's Bridal and we are honored to call ourselves a tiny part of your Big Day.

name: Monica Hill
text:
Took my daughter in search for the perfect dress.  We didn't have an appointment so I wasn't expecting much. We walked into the boutique, Anna greeted us with a warm smile and a "Good morning". From that moment forward it was like a fairytale experience! The appointment she had scheduled happened to reschedule, it was a sign in my eyes that this was definitely where we were suppose to be! Both Eva & Anna were kind and inviting! I'm so glad I decided to stop here!
Thank you both for a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind feedback Monica. Courtney sure made a Beautiful Bride and we are absolutely honored you Ladies chose Evanna's Bridal to be your wedding dress shopping destination.

name: Morgan Rotch
text: These women are amazing! So hard working and they have a beautiful selection!

resp.text: Thank you Morgan! We really appreciate your kind feedback.

name: Lauren Mosley
text: Can’t say enough about the ladies at Evanna’s! I had my dress altered here and I couldn’t be more pleased with the experience! They do incredible work!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind feedback Lauren, it is much appreciated!

name: Megan Moore
text: Evanna’s bridal boutique altered my sample sale gown. They could not have done a better job!! The gown was ripped in the back, dingy, and needed major alterations. When we picked up the gown, it fit perfectly and looked brand new! They also placed my late MIL’s veil on a new comb for me. I could not be more pleased with their work! Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Megan, We're so happy we could help! We really appreciate your kind feedback & we are honored you chose Evanna's Bridal alteration services.

text: These ladies helped me find my perfect dress! They were so sweet & helpful. They’re new to town, but SO worth it. Thank You!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Emily. It was so much fun helping you shop for your dream dress! We are honored to call ourselves a tiny part of your Big Day.

They gave me my measurments and even helped me look for a dress online with their own time because they knew I was in a pinch for a bridesmaid dress. The two women who work there went above and beyond to help me out even though I didn't make a purchase from them. Awesome people!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Shelby. Your kind feedback is much appreciated.

resp.text: Thank you so much Diana! It was pure joy to work with you. You looked absolutely gorgeous on your wedding day. We really appreciate your positive feedback.

We had a great experience at this bridal shop & we all highly recommend Evanna’s Bridal!

name: Kaci Coker
text: Went in to purchase a wedding dress. Found one on the rack that I was going to purchase. Paid $900 towards the dress, then my husband got deployed and the wedding was cancelled, we eloped prior to deployment instead. I called to ask if I could have a store credit since the dress did not have to be ordered, it was already hanging in their store. NO. Half a store credit? NO. This was in September that I spoke with them. Now in April they call again to ask me to pay for the rest and pick my dress up. 🤦🏻‍♀️ Needless to say, I’m still out $900, and I’m not paying the additional money for a dress I won’t wear. I don’t feel this is the best way to support our military, either.

name: K Mc
text: I highly recommend this place...they are awesome! The ladies there are friendly, knowledgeable and super helpful.  We came all the way from AR to get a prom dress for my daughter and they found the perfect one.

name: Thereal Azia
text: Found my prom dress here the staff were amazing and patient I highly recommend this place

name: Brook Smith
text: Wonderful place!  Love Mrs. Dorinda and Sandy. 🥰

name: Heidi Crawhorn
text: Loved the experience that they gave my daughter..... Will post pictures after next weekend

name: Latoya Scott-Dickens
text: Well my original visit to the shop was wonderful! My baby cousin found the dress for prom so we placed a deposit to reserve the dress. Now clearly on the receipt it says all sales are final, no refunds, 30% layaway restocking fee. Well fast forward to now, all events have been canceled. She is a senior, so no need for the dress. Now I'm not a dummy, I know getting the entire deposit back is a long shot, but I figured that I would at least get half, because after all I have not purchased the dress, just made a deposit, and the dress is still at the store..right?... WRONG!  Not only am I informed of the policy of no refund and all sales being final, but I am told I can either purchase the dress, or use the store credit..that expires in 6 month!!!! I'm livid..this pandemic is beyond my control. I understand that it's a business, but how does a deposit to reserve.a dress qualify as a sale, when I do not have possession of the dress? Will not be going back .so disappointed! And I'm out of $200.

name: Ashley Newton
text: Formally Yours is such a wonderful boutique for finding the perfect dress for your special day!  My daughter found her perfect prom gown there years ago.  Today she found her perfect wedding gown.  The staff at Formally Yours knows their gowns, designers, and their clients.  They made finding the perfect gown an easy and wonderful experience!  Trust Formally Yours to find the dress of your dreams.  They make it so easy to say "yes" to a dress!!

name: Jodi singleton
text: They messed up my hair I wanted blonde and I got brown gray purple color it was awful I had to pay someone else to fix it I will never be back and never recommend they won't even try and make it right I'm out $260 for one hair do

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that your experience wasn’t to your standards. The paper work that you signed at the beginning of your service, explains that if you are unsatisfied with your hair, your stylist will be more than happy to come up with an arrangement to get your hair where you would like it to be. We truly wish you would have come to us first so we could evaluate your hair and make it right for you without the additional costs of another salon. We have offered for you to come in and have us take a look at your hair to evaluate the situation, and we are sorry that you did not want to come in to work this out. Unfortunately, due to the time your stylist spent with you, product used, and not having the opportunity to evaluate your hair in person, we are unable to refund you for this service. Upon reviewing your paper work, your stylist noted that your hair would need more than one service to achieve the end results that you were wanting. This is due to the fact that your hair was already previously lightened at home before your visit to us. We are always striving for what's best for our clients. In this circumstance, your hair wouldn't be able to handle any further lightening in one visit. It is our understanding that in order to protect the integrity of your hair, you and your stylist decided to go with a darker blonde until your next service. We aren't quite sure what happened between the time you left the salon and now, but after your service you told us that you loved your hair and even booked your future reservation with us. We deeply value you as a customer of ours and we are sorry to see you go. We appreciate your review and we hope you have a wonderful day.

name: Ellen Gray
text: Highly recommend!

name: Lace Miller

name: Caitlin Brown
text: Horrible experience... first of all it’s not professional to have people waiting on you outside of your store because you didn’t open on time.. waited for 15/20 minutes past time for the store to be open along with many others trying to return suits. The owner Donna wouldn’t leave us alone while trying to find a dress, she would hover over your shoulder telling you she would take the dresses to the back for you multiple times while just trying to find what you like. Literally she watched us like a hawk didn’t let us breathe.  She also accused my family of trying to steal from her store all because she thought we had more than 5 dresses in the dressing room (when we did not, we had 2) she took all of our dresses to and from the dressing room and then tried to say she didn’t. No offense but, how do you walk out of a store with a huge prom dress when you have no purse or anything because she doesn’t even allow you to bring your purse inside AND while she is breathing down your neck the entire time???? She is not afraid to tell you that something won’t look right on you when it’s not her dress to wear. She also tells people to get out because it overwhelms her when too many people are in her store as they are walking in... heard her tell multiple people this while in her store. Just overall VERY RUDE and I would NOT suggest wasting your time on such a horrible place to shop. Very VERY disappointed in such unprofessionalism.
